source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000010_THANCRED<tab>They've almost finished loading our cargo. We should be ready to depart right on schedule, or so I'm told.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000010_THANCREDそろそろ荷の積み下ろしが終わるそうだ。
乗船は問題なく始まりそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000020_YSHTOLA<tab>Excellent. 'Tis nice to have a smooth beginning to one's journey, at the very least.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000020_YSHTOLAあら、聞いてきてくれたのね。
よかったわ、旅の最初くらいは順調にいきたいもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000030_THANCRED<tab>It's funny...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000030_THANCRED<tab>まったくだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000040_THANCRED<tab>Master Louisoix came here on a ship very much like this one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000040_THANCREDこの街に住んでたガキのころ……
こいつと同じ外洋航路船でシャーレアンから来た、
ルイゾワ様に出会ったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000050_THANCRED<tab>And now, years later, the street urchin he befriended that day is bound for his mentor's homeland. With his mentor's grandchildren, no less.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000050_THANCREDそして今、その孫たちとシャーレアンに帰ろうとしている……。
つくづく不思議なもんだな、人生ってやつは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000060_URIANGER<tab>Aye, 'tis upon reflection that every twist of time's river and fate's whims are brought into sharp relief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000060_URIANGER<tab>……ええ、流れゆく時を感じます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000070_URIANGER<tab>Thou hast matured much in the intervening years. Wert thou not caught attempting to relieve Master Louisoix of his purse scant moments after he made landfall upon this dock?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000070_URIANGER当時のあなたは、この港に降り立った我が師に、
窃盗を働こうとして返り討ちにされたとか……。
ずいぶん成長しましたね、サンクレッド。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000080_ALISAIE<tab>Oh really? Now that's a tale I'd like to hear!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000080_ALISAIEへえぇ？
それ、詳しく聞いてみたいわね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Will this be your first visit to Sharlayan, Ser Estinien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000090_ALPHINAUD<tab>エスティニアン殿は、シャーレアンに行くのは初めてかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Ser Estinien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>……エスティニアン殿？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000110_ESTINIEN<tab> ...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000110_ESTINIEN<tab>はぁ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000120_ESTINIEN<tab>Are we strangers newly met? Why this stiff formality?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000120_ESTINIEN<tab>お前、いつまで俺だけ他人行儀に呼ぶつもりだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000130_ALPHINAUD<tab>I...ah...merely meant it as a professional courtesy, since we are now colleagues in an official sense...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000130_ALPHINAUDえっ、ち、違うんだ……！
これは、その……尊敬しているからであって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>I'd rather you dispense with the “sers,” especially in private company.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>だったら改めろ、ほかと同じでいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>Or I'll be forced to respond in kind. “Little Lord Alphinaud.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000150_ESTINIENでないと俺も、特別に敬って呼ぶぞ……
なあ、アルフィノ坊ちゃん？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>You've made your point, Estinien. Painfully well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000160_ALPHINAUDう……わかったから、その呼び方はよしてくれ。
これからも仲間としてよろしく頼むよ……エスティニアン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000165_ESTINIEN<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000165_ESTINIEN<tab>フ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000170_ESTINIEN<tab>Better.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000170_ESTINIEN<tab>ああ、まあ、それなりにな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000180_GRAHATIA<tab>Are you all right, Tataru? You seem positively distraught.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000180_GRAHATIAタタル、どうかしたか？
すごく不安だって、顔に書いてあるぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000190_TATARU<tab>Distraught? Me? Don't be silly! I think it's lovely that they get to see their homeland.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000190_TATARUあっ、いえ、そういうわけじゃ……！
シャーレアンは、みなさんにとって故郷でもありまっすし……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000200_TATARU<tab>It's just...we're trying to thwart the schemes of an army hells-bent on destroying the world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000200_TATARU……ただ、相手にするのは、
世界の破壊を企むテロフォロイでっす。
きっとまた、命懸けの戦いになりまっす……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000210_TATARU<tab>And once again I have to stay behind and worry that this is the last time I'll get to see my friends...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000210_TATARU私はこちらに残りまっすから、
またみなさんと無事に会えるのかなって、
つい、考えてしまって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll bring them back safe and sound. I promise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>必ず無事に戻ってくる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>No sense worrying about the things we're powerless to change.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>今度ばかりは帰れないかも……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000220_TATARU<tab>I'll hold you to that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000220_TATARU<tab>はい……約束でっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000230_TATARU<tab>Well that's hardly comforting!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000230_TATARU<tab>お、お、脅かさないでほしいでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000240_HOARYBOULDER<tab>Ah, good, you're still here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000240_HOARYBOULDER<tab>(-？？？？-)おお、間に合ったようでよかった！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000250_ALISAIE<tab>Hoary! Coultenet! What brings you all this way?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000250_ALISAIEホーリー・ボルダー！
クルトゥネも、どうしたの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000260_HOARYBOULDER<tab>We're to assist the Maelstrom and the kobolds with a lunar primal operation, so we thought we'd see you off before heading to the tower.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000260_HOARYBOULDER私たちはこれからラノシアの「塔」へ向かい、
黒渦団やコボルド族と協力して、異形の蛮神対策にあたります。
その前に、見送りをと思いまして。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000270_HOARYBOULDER<tab>F'lhaminn and the others wish you all a safe journey, and promise that they'll look after things here until you return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000270_HOARYBOULDER留守を守ってくれているフ・ラミンさんや、任務中の面々が、
皆さんの無事を願っていると言っていました。
そして「こっちは任された」とも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000280_HOARYBOULDER<tab>We will too, of course! Aye, we your fellow Scions of the Seventh Dawn will do our part to ensure the end of the world won't happen on our watch!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000280_HOARYBOULDER……私たちも同じ気持ちです。
「暁の血盟」を挙げて、世界の終焉を退けましょう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000290_LINERCREW<tab>We're set to sail! All aboard for Sharlayan!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000290_LINERCREW出港の準備ができたぞ！
シャーレアンに向かう奴は、すみやかに乗ってくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000300_THANCRED<tab>It's time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000300_THANCRED<tab>……時間だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then we must delay no longer. We will contact you the moment we learn aught of value. Wish us luck.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000310_ALPHINAUDでは、行ってくるよ。
有力な情報を得られたら、すぐに連絡する。
こちらで任務にあたる皆こそ、くれぐれも気をつけてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000320_TATARU<tab>Have a safe journey! And please, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var> be careful!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000320_TATARU<tab>みなさん……いってらっしゃいまっせ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000330_EMETSELCH<tab>And so you venture forth unto the unknown.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000330_EMETSELCH<tab>――そうしてまた  お前は１歩を踏み出した

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000340_EMETSELCH<tab>A fate beyond the horizon that cannot be divined. A future undefined and in flux.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000340_EMETSELCHそれがやがて世界を救うのかは
今の私たちをして 定められず

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000350_EMETSELCH<tab>In uncertain times, naught but the simplest words of wisdom will suffice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000350_EMETSELCH<tab>ゆえにただ  新たな幕開けにふさわしい言葉を添えよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000360_EMETSELCH<tab>That which lives is destined to die. Love leads to loss. Every beginning has an end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000360_EMETSELCH生きることは 死にゆくこと
出会えば別れ 始まれば終わる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000370_EMETSELCH<tab>Treasure every moment, every step of your descent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000370_EMETSELCHせいぜい惜しんで進むがいい
その旅の先――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000380_EMETSELCH<tab>And there in the depths where souls and stars rest─find your truth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000380_EMETSELCH<tab>星と命の没む海底に  真実は待つ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000390_HYDAELYN<tab>Hear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000390_HYDAELYN<tab>聞いて……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000400_HYDAELYN<tab>Feel...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000400_HYDAELYN<tab>感じて……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000410_HYDAELYN<tab>Think...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000410_HYDAELYN<tab>考えて……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000420_GRAHATIA<tab>The day has barely dawned, my fellow earlier riser.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000420_GRAHATIAあんたも目が覚めたのか。
まだ明け方だぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000430_GRAHATIA<tab>Though we're hardly alone in that. Envious of those still sleeping soundly, no doubt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000430_GRAHATIAまあ、ここで熟睡する方が難しいよな。
まわりも、起きてる奴の方が多そうだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000440_GRAHATIA<tab>Called out to you, you say? Hmm. I've heard nothing myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000440_GRAHATIA誰かに呼びかけられてた？
いや、少なくともオレには聞こえなかったが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000450_GRAHATIA<tab>In any case, I daresay the sea air will do you good. Why not join the others on deck? Sharlayan should be coming into view at any moment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000450_GRAHATIAとりあえず、外の空気でも吸ってきたらどうだ？
ほかのみんなも、そうしてるみたいだ。
もうすぐシャーレアン本島が見えてもいいころだしな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000460_HYDAELYN<tab>(-???-)My voice yet reaches you. I am glad.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000460_HYDAELYN(-？？？？-)よかった……。
私の声が、まだあなたに届いてくれて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000470_HYDAELYN<tab>(-???-)Hear, feel, think...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000470_HYDAELYN<tab>(-？？？？-)聞いて、感じて、考えて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000480_HYDAELYN<tab>And thus do we meet face-to-face at last. My Warrior of Light, guided by the Crystal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000480_HYDAELYNこうして地上で言葉を交わすのは初めてですね。
……クリスタルに導かれし、光の戦士よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why now, Hydaelyn?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ハイデリン、どうして今さら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can trust your words no longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前の言葉は、もう信用できない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000490_HYDAELYN<tab>After your sojourn in the First, I believe you have your answer...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000490_HYDAELYNついに第一世界での旅を終えたあなたなら、
想像がつくかもしれません……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000500_HYDAELYN<tab>You have visited the First. You...have every right to say that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000500_HYDAELYNええ、第一世界での旅を終えたあなたには、
そう言われるのではないかと思っていました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000510_HYDAELYN<tab>You have gained an understanding of what I truly am. What Hydaelyn has always been. A primal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000510_HYDAELYNあなたが見て、聞いて、触れてきたとおり、
私は……ハイデリンは旧き蛮神です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000520_HYDAELYN<tab>Zodiark was created to forestall the apocalypse which threatened the ancient world. And I was brought forth to bind Him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000520_HYDAELYNいにしえの時代、
終末の災厄を退けるために創られたゾディアーク。
そして私は、それを制するもの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000530_HYDAELYN<tab>Yet seven times now, those who would orchestrate a return to that bygone era have rejoined a shard to the god I had sundered.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000530_HYDAELYNけれど、あの時代を取り戻さんとする者の強い願いによって、
もう七度、ゾディアークの統合を許しています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000540_HYDAELYN<tab>The greater His strength grows, the swifter does mine own diminish. The power to draw your mind into the rift betwixt is no longer mine to wield.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000540_HYDAELYNそうしてかの神が力を集めるほど、
私は急速に摩耗していく……。
もはや、あなたの意識を狭間の領域に呼ぶことさえ叶いません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000550_HYDAELYN<tab>Yet though it taxes me sorely, I dare not leave these words unsaid.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000550_HYDAELYNそれでも、今回だけは……
どうしても伝えなければならなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000560_HYDAELYN<tab>Even bereft of my guidance, you and your companions have accepted the burden of this star's troubled past. A conjunction has begun to form; an intertwining of your time and mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000560_HYDAELYNあなたたちは、私に導かれずとも、
己の意志で星の過去を受け止めました。
以て、私とあなた、ふたつの時間が交わりかけています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000570_HYDAELYN<tab>Wheels shudder and turn. Conflict looms─monumental─which will decide the fate of this world and all life upon it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000570_HYDAELYNだからこそ、始まってしまうかもしれない……
星と命を巡る試練、運命を決するための大いなる戦いが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000580_HYDAELYN<tab>When you truly understand what is at stake, and your journey has prepared you to surmount the insurmountable...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000580_HYDAELYNあなたがこの言葉の意味を知るとき、
過酷な試練を超える力を、その旅路のうちに得ていたのなら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000590_HYDAELYN<tab>Then shall I honor the promise made in another time. Another age.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000590_HYDAELYN<tab>遠い遠い、時の彼方で交わされた約束を、果たしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000600_LINERCREW<tab>Cast yer peepers to the fore, folks! Sharlayan's just over yonder!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000600_LINERCREWさあ、起きてる奴は前方をご覧あれ！
目的のシャーレアン本島が見えてきたぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000610_HYDAELYN<tab>I will not keep you further. Your traveler's heart must yearn to behold this unfamiliar land.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000610_HYDAELYNお行きなさい。
どんなときだって、旅人は新天地に目を輝かせるものよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000620_HYDAELYN<tab>We shall meet again...and soon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000620_HYDAELYN<tab>きっとまたすぐに……会いましょう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000630_ALISAIE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000630_ALISAIE<tab>んー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000640_ALISAIE<tab>What a fine morning. Oof. Still a bit stiff, though.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000640_ALISAIEはぁ、いい朝ね。
ちょっと身体は痛いけど！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000650_ALPHINAUD<tab>And a good morning to you, too. Taken a look at the island already?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000650_ALPHINAUDやあ、おはよう。
君はもう、島を見たのかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000660_ALISAIE<tab>Then let's go, let's go! Might still be room in the prow if we're lucky.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000660_ALISAIEじゃ、一緒に見に行きましょ！
船首の方、空いてるかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000670_THANCRED<tab>Ah! The sleepers have arisen!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000670_THANCRED<tab>ああ、やっぱり来たか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000680_THANCRED<tab>There she is. Good ol' Sharlayan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000680_THANCRED今朝はよく見えるぞ。
懐かしの、シャーレアン本国だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh, I see it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ……本当だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000700_ALISAIE<tab>Home. Home at last. Well...maybe not in Father's eyes...but we'll manage on our own, if we must.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000700_ALISAIE帰ってきたのね、私たち。
ルヴェユール家に戻るためじゃなく……
自分の選んだ道を進むために。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>You do know you're not alone in this, don't you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>別に、お前たちだけでやれって話でもないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000720_URIANGER<tab>Indeed, 'tis as Ser Estinien sayeth. Forget not the comrades who boarded this ship at your side, I prithee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000720_URIANGERええ、彼の言うとおり……
私たちが同じ船に乗っているということを、
どうかお忘れにならぬよう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you, my friends. We are ever grateful for your steadfast support.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000730_ALPHINAUDありがとう、みんな。
もちろん、何より頼りにしているとも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>Upon arrival, we will be disembarking into the heart of Sharlayan proper.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000740_YSHTOLAこの船が入港するのは、本国の中心地でもある、
「オールド・シャーレアン」よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000750_YSHTOLA<tab>There is no greater concentration of wisdom in all the world. I am confident that, somewhere within that center of knowledge and learning, we will find the answers we seek.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000750_YSHTOLAあらゆる知識と情報が集まるあの都で、
私たちは必ず成果を上げる……
待っていてくれる人たちのためにも、ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000760_EMETSELCH<tab>Sharlayan, the solitary island nation of the northern seas.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000760_EMETSELCH<tab>北洋諸島唯一の都市国家  シャーレアン――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000770_EMETSELCH<tab>Where under the watchful gaze of Thaliak, patron deity of scholars, academics hoard all manner of knowledge and secrets.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000770_EMETSELCH知神サリャクを守護神として掲げ
あらゆる知識の集積者たらんとする学術都市だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000780_EMETSELCH<tab>Once, they deigned to accept foreign students into a distant colony maintained in the Dravanian hinterlands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000780_EMETSELCHかつては低地ドラヴァニアにも植民都市を持ち
各国からの留学生を受け入れていたものだが――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000790_EMETSELCH<tab>How swiftly they abandoned it once the first Garlean boot set hostile foot on Ala Mhigan soil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000790_EMETSELCHガレマール帝国のアラミゴ侵攻を受け
一夜にして「大撤収」を果たす

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000800_EMETSELCH<tab>So averse to the prosecution of war, these men of wisdom. Your would-be allies...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000800_EMETSELCHそれほどまでに戦を嫌う篤学者たちは
果たして お前の味方となり得るものか

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000810_THANCRED<tab>I thought they'd never let us off the ship... What's next, then? Entry applications?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000810_THANCRED下船できるまで時間がかかったな……
次は入国手続きか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>Hopefully they find no cause to deny us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000820_YSHTOLAええ……。
そっちでは引っかからないといいのだけれど。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000830_ESTINIEN<tab>Hasn't Sharlayan all but severed relations with foreign powers? Those of us without direct ties─myself included─may be refused outright...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000830_ESTINIENシャーレアンは、国交を閉ざしてる状態なんだろう？
今更だが、俺やこいつのような余所者でも許可はおりるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000840_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis true that, as a nation, Sharlayan only forms trade agreements with a select few neutral countries.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000840_YSHTOLAええ、確かに国家規模での取引は、
同盟を結んでいる一部の中立国としかしていないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000850_YSHTOLA<tab>But from a practical standpoint, an island cannot afford to be overly strict with its borders. Especially not if that island's people are wholly devoted to the accumulation of knowledge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000850_YSHTOLAとはいえ、鎖国を強固にしすぎては、
生活するにも不便だし、
大目的である知識の集積にも支障がでる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000860_YSHTOLA<tab>If one submits the proper paperwork, with satisfactory evidence of identity and intent, then foreigners may be granted entry.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000860_YSHTOLAだから、きちんと申請がされていて、
目的や身元を証明できさえすれば、
シャーレアン人でなくても入国は可能になっているのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000870_ESTINIEN<tab>...“May.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000870_ESTINIEN<tab>……なるほどな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>Quite. So let us be absolutely clear on these points before we proceed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>それについて、みんなにも念押ししておきたいことがあるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000890_YSHTOLA<tab>The immigration officer will ask for your affiliation and your purpose of visit. Considering Sharlayan's views on intervention, I strongly suggest we avoid any mention of the Scions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000890_YSHTOLA入国手続きでは、所属や目的を問われるはず。
そこでシャーレアン外の機関である「暁」を名乗るのは、
情勢的に避けておきたいわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000900_YSHTOLA<tab>Krile has laid the groundwork for us to act as associates of the Students of Baldesion, and our ostensible reason for being here is to aid in their order's restoration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000900_YSHTOLAクルルからの連絡にあったとおり、
バルデシオン委員会再建のための協力者……
という形で話を進めましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>G'raha Tia, it might expedite our progress should an actual Student be seen at the head of our little group. Would you mind leading the way?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000910_YSHTOLAあなたは元からバルデシオン委員会の所属でしょう？
私たちの引率役ということで、先導してもらえるかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000920_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course. The immigration offices were this way, as I recall. Shall we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000920_GRAHATIA了解だ。
入国手続きは……確かこの先だったよな。
さっそく行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000930_GRAHATIA<tab>Greetings! We've just arrived, and are eager to make our way into the city. Would you be so kind as to process our entry applications?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000930_GRAHATIA<tab>さっきの船で到着したんだが、入国手続きを頼めるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000940_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Certainly. I see by your mark you are an Archon?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000940_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFええ、もちろん。
その紋様……賢人ですね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000950_GRAHATIA<tab>I am. G'raha Tia of the Students of Baldesion, at your service.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000950_GRAHATIAああ、バルデシオン委員会所属の賢人、
グ・ラハ・ティアだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000960_GRAHATIA<tab>I was assigned to an Eorzean survey team, but have returned to assist with the reformation of my order. My associates here will provide additional support.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000960_GRAHATIAエオルゼアで調査にあたってたんだが、
委員会を立て直すため、
力になってくれる奴らを連れて帰還した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000970_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Very good. I have paperwork detailing your group and its scheduled arrival for today.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000970_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFなるほど。
確かに、バルデシオン委員会の協力者については、
本日づけで到着予定との申請を受けています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000980_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>And it seems some few of your companions are also Archons. If you'll step forward, we can process those applications first.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000980_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF……ほかにも数名、賢人がいらっしゃるようですね。
では、まとめて先に手続きをさせていただきます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>Y'shtola Rhul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>ヤ・シュトラ・ルルよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001000_ALISAIE<tab>See how it glows? That list is aetherically linked with the citizen registry kept in the main repository.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001000_ALISAIEあれ、魔法の名簿だわ。
大書院に保管されている国民名簿と繋がってるのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001010_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>I've confirmed your status as Archons and amended your travel records accordingly. Welcome home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001010_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF全員確認がとれましたので、
出入国の履歴に追記をしておきました。
あなた方の手続きは以上です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001020_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Now, who do we have here...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001020_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>では、次の方……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alphinaud Leveilleur.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001030_ALPHINAUD<tab>アルフィノ・ルヴェユールだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001040_ALISAIE<tab>And Alisaie Leveilleur.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001040_ALISAIE<tab>同じく、アリゼー・ルヴェユールよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001050_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Your applications have also been approved. Having said that...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001050_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFはい、こちらも問題なく完了です。
ですが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001060_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>The streets are abuzz with talk of how House Leveilleur's lord disowned his young progeny.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001060_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFルヴェユール家のご子息とご息女は勘当されたと、
最近もっぱらの噂ですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001070_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>And while such personal circumstances constitute no reason to deny you entry, I urge you to avoid...exacerbating your present situation. Times are quite troubled enough already.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001070_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFそうであっても帰国を拒む理由にはなりませんが、
なにかと憂慮すべきことが多い時世です。
くれぐれも、問題は起こさないように……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shall keep that in mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>……ああ、肝に銘じておこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001090_GRAHATIA<tab>These last two are not Sharlayan natives, but you will find their credentials are in order. An application was made in advance...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001090_GRAHATIAあとのふたりは、シャーレアン外の協力者なんだが……
申請はされているはずだから、確認してくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001100_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Hmph. Name and occupation?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001100_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>ふむ、お名前とご職業は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>. Adventurer by trade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>、冒険者だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>. Artisan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>、職人だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>. Champion of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>、英雄だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001110_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>An “adventurer...” Well, I suppose that is considered a valid calling in your native Eorzea, and it does indeed match the profile provided. You may enter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001110_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF冒険者……冒険者ねぇ……。
まあ、エオルゼアでは正式な職業になっているようですし、
申請とも相違はないのでいいでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001120_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Indeed... Your profile describes you as an “adventurer,” but one also trained in the rather more constructive pursuits of procurement and production. You may enter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001120_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF確かに、申請にもそう名乗るだろうと書かれていました。
製作や採集にかぎらず仕事を請け負う冒険者だとも。
……まあ、相違はないのでよしとしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001130_GRAHATIA<tab>And it is a title well earned, I can assure you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001130_GRAHATIAああ、その人は本物の英雄だ……！
オレが保証する！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001140_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>An “adventurer” by trade is what your documentation indicates. No mention of this particular title─self-appointed, I take it? Either way, your employer seems willing to vouch for your character, so I shall─albeit reluctantly─grant you entry. “Champion.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001140_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF申請には冒険者と書かれていましたよ。
……自称英雄とか、どうなんです？
まあ、雇い主が認めてるようなのでいいですが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001150_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>And you, sir?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001150_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>それで、そちらの方は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001160_ESTINIEN<tab>Estinien Varlineau. Formerly of the Order of the Knights Dragoon in Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001160_ESTINIENエスティニアン・ヴァーリノ。
イシュガルドの竜騎士団に所属していた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001170_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>“Formerly,” at least. And what, pray tell, is your “profession” now?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001170_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFしていた……つまり元軍人ですね。
失礼ですが、今は何をお仕事に？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001180_KRILE<tab>(-???-)If you'll allow me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001180_KRILE<tab>(-？？？？-)ま、待ってください……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001190_KRILE<tab>My associate is a mercenary, hired for his strength at arms! Surely you are aware of the dangers we often face on our forays into the wilderness?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001190_KRILEその人は、間違いなく、うちで雇った傭兵です……！
ほら、バルデシオン委員会には、
危険地帯での調査がつきものでしょう……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001200_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Mistress Baldesion. If you insist on sponsoring his entry, then so be it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001200_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFクルル・バルデシオン。
申請の主であるあなたがそう証言するのなら構いませんが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001210_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>But while I appreciate that desperate times call for desperate measures, I find your choice of company concerning. Be advised that even a single misstep may have severe repercussions for your organization.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001210_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFFいくら背に腹がかえられない状況でも、
胡乱な連中を呼び込むのは感心しませんね。
一歩間違えれば、今度こそあなた方の組織は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001220_KRILE<tab>I have every confidence in my chosen company, dear and trusted comrades that they are. But I thank you for your concern.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001220_KRILEご忠告ありがとうございます。
大丈夫、彼らは信頼できる友人で、仲間ですから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Krile, it is good to see you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001230_ALPHINAUD<tab>クルルさん、元気そうでよかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001240_KRILE<tab>Likewise! Long voyage notwithstanding, you all seem none the worse for wear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001240_KRILEそれはこっちの台詞よ。
みんな、船旅おつかれさま！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001250_KRILE<tab>There is much to discuss, but this is hardly the place. Let's be on our way, shall we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001250_KRILEさっそくいろいろ話したいところだけど、
ここだと邪魔になっちゃうわね……むこうに行きましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001260_KRILE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001260_KRILE<tab>あっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001270_KRILE<tab>Welcome, friends, to Sharlayan!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001270_KRILE<tab>ようこそ、オールド・シャーレアンへ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001280_ESTINIEN<tab>As your “mercenary,” I should hope my welcome includes a generous salary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001280_ESTINIEN<tab>お抱えの傭兵とくれば、報酬は弾んでもらえそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001290_KRILE<tab>I had to say something, Ser Taciturn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001290_KRILE<tab>あれは、そっちが言葉に詰まるからでしょ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001300_URIANGER<tab>Pray forgive me. I was delayed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001300_URIANGER<tab>失礼、遅くなりました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001310_YSHTOLA<tab>It's fine, Urianger. We're all here now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001310_YSHTOLA大丈夫よ。
これで全員そろったわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001320_KRILE<tab>Let's get down to business then, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001320_KRILE<tab>それじゃあ、ひとまず私から話をさせてもらおうかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001330_KRILE<tab>Come what may, we must prevent the Telophoroi's plans from coming to fruition. At present, I see two paths for gathering the information which may aid us in achieving that goal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001330_KRILE私たちの目標は、テロフォロイの陰謀を阻止すること。
それに繋がる情報が得られそうな手段として、
現状、ふたつの調査があるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001340_KRILE<tab>The first involves an investigation into the change which has come over Sharlayan, not to mention the recent, inscrutable behavior of the Forum.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001340_KRILEひとつ目。
これはみんなも知ってる、シャーレアンの異変。
哲学者議会が不可解な動きをしているって件ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001350_KRILE<tab>As most of you know, the ninety-nine members of the Forum are elected from the general populace. This alone guarantees a plethora of opinion with regards to foreign policy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001350_KRILEあの議会は国民から選ばれた99人の議員から成るんだけど、
それだけいれば、外交についての考え方も当然いろいろあるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001360_KRILE<tab>The Bibliothecs, for example, are a group of conservatives which would have Sharlayan focus on recording history, while remaining entirely uninvolved in the making of it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001360_KRILEたとえば、ライブラリアンと呼ばれる一派は、
歴史の記録者に徹することを重要視して、
徹底的な不干渉を奨めている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001370_KRILE<tab>And at the other extreme, we have advocates for proactive diplomacy and direct intervention. My grandfather, Galuf, was one such member, as was Archon Louisoix.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001370_KRILE一方で、他国との協力に前向きな議員もいるわ。
ルイゾワ様や、うちのガラフおじいちゃんに近い考え方ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001380_KRILE<tab>Yet despite our diverse factions and philosophies, the recent vote to deny Eorzea's request for assistance was unanimous.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001380_KRILE……ただ、今回エオルゼアからの要請を断った件については、
派閥も主張も関係なく、みんな「協力できない」の一点張り。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001390_KRILE<tab>Even more concerning was the fact that many cited other, more pressing duties as justification for their recalcitrance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001390_KRILE気になったのは、その中に、
「今はほかにすべきことがある」という口ぶりの人が、
少なからずいたことよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001400_GRAHATIA<tab>Fourchenault's refusal in Gridania had those same undertones. 'Twas as if, having stared unblinking into the face of impending doom, he'd simply turned away to pursue something more important. But what could that possibly be?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001400_GRAHATIAグリダニアで聞いたフルシュノさんの言葉もそうだった。
まるで終末ってものを理解した上で、
別の行動を選んでいるかのような……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001410_KRILE<tab>A mystery, indeed, and one which I ask for your help to solve. Our future may depend on it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001410_KRILEそこを、私だけじゃなく、みんなの力を借りて調べたい。
……それがひとつ目の調査ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001420_KRILE<tab>As for our second potential path, it concerns a request made directly to the Students of Baldesion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001420_KRILEふたつ目は、つい先日バルデシオン委員会に届いた、
ある依頼に関する話なの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001430_KRILE<tab>Our organization was founded primarily to study strange and unexplained phenomena the world over. Mysterious relics and ruins, arcane disturbances, and so forth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001430_KRILEそもそもうちは、
世界各地にある未解明なものを研究する組織よ。
遺物や遺構、魔法なんかをね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001440_KRILE<tab>Compared to our more isolationist Sharlayan colleagues, we have strong connections overseas─namely with scholars and academics who share our passion for the unknown.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001440_KRILEだからこそ、排他的になりがちなシャーレアンの組織の中でも、
外との繋がりがとくに強い。
各地に共同研究者や協力者がいるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001450_KRILE<tab>The request in question comes from one such acquaintance─Nidhana, an alchemist residing in distant Thavnair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001450_KRILE今回連絡をくれたのは、
サベネア島に住む、錬金術師のニッダーナ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001460_KRILE<tab>Her missive describes the sudden appearance of a tower, and the subsequent summoning of what I can only assume is a lunar primal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001460_KRILEどうやらあちらにも「塔」が出現して、
異形の蛮神が喚び出されているみたいなの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001470_KRILE<tab>In response to this threat, the satrap of Radz-at-Han─the individual who governs the city-state─has instructed the alchemists to find a means to deal with the spire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001470_KRILEサベネア島を領有する「ラザハン」、
その長にあたる「太守」の指示のもと、
錬金術師たちが塔の攻略法を探しているそうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001480_URIANGER<tab>The artisans of that land are heirs to an ancient tradition─one rather unlike that of their Ul'dahn counterparts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001480_URIANGERかの地の錬金術といえば、非常に古い歴史を持ち、
ウルダハ式とは異なる体系を有している……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001490_URIANGER<tab>'Tis possible─nay, probable─that they have gleaned truths unattainable by Eorzea or her Far Eastern allies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001490_URIANGER塔について、エオルゼアや東方にはなかった見識も、
あるいは得ているやもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001500_KRILE<tab>They do, in fact, appear to have a strategy in mind, though it will require further research. To that end, they have requested an introduction to a capable warrior shielded by the blessing of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001500_KRILE実際、何か方策があるみたい。
その研究のために、できるだけ戦闘に長けた、
「光の加護」を持つ人を紹介してほしいという依頼だったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001510_YSHTOLA<tab>Assuming we divide our forces to pursue both of Krile's lines of inquiry, then having you join the group heading to Thavnair would seem the obvious choice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001510_YSHTOLAとなると、手分けをするとしたら、
あなたにはサベネア島へ行ってもらうべきかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>But the investigation in Sharlayan is of vital importance as well. Equal, I think, to the Thavnairian one, given that the fate of the world may hinge on the results of both.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001520_YSHTOLA終末に関わることだから、
シャーレアンの調査にも加わってほしいところだけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001530_KRILE<tab>Yes, it is quite the quandary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001530_KRILE<tab>そうなのよね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001540_KRILE<tab>Though it is a great imposition─and an altogether-too-common one─our efforts would be more likely to succeed were you to lead the charge on both fronts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001540_KRILE忙しくさせちゃって申し訳ないけれど、
あなたには、どちらにも手を貸してもらえると嬉しいわ。
順番はお任せするから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001550_KRILE<tab>You are indeed our champion. As to which task to tackle first, we will defer to your decision. Let us next decide how everyone else might best be assigned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001550_KRILEありがとう。
それじゃあ、ほかのみんなの割り当てを決めておくわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001560_KRILE<tab>As for myself, I shall continue what I've begun in Sharlayan. I should also like to steal the services of an Archon or two.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001560_KRILEシャーレアンの調査については、引き続き私が。
それから、賢人位を持ってる人の協力がほしいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001570_YSHTOLA<tab>And thereby gain access to a greater range of reading material. I will help with that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001570_YSHTOLA閲覧できる資料を増やしたいということね。
いいわ、私が協力する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001580_GRAHATIA<tab>Allow me to offer my assistance. I have some small amount of experience in the field of research.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001580_GRAHATIAそういうことなら、オレも。
調べものなら、それなりに力になれそうだしな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie and I would also like to help, if you would have us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001590_ALPHINAUDよければ、私とアリゼーも、
そちらに加えてもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001600_ALISAIE<tab>Anything to understand even a fraction of what our father and the Forum might be thinking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001600_ALISAIE<tab>お父様や哲学者議会が何を考えてるのか、少しでも知りたいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001610_KRILE<tab>Of course, the more the merrier!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001610_KRILEもちろんよ。
是非ふたりの力を貸して！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001620_THANCRED<tab>Right, the rest of us will make the journey to Thavnair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001620_THANCRED<tab>なら、残りの面子でサベネア島の様子を見てくるとするか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001630_THANCRED<tab>Thoughts? Objections?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001630_THANCRED<tab>お前もそれで構わないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001640_ESTINIEN<tab>I passed through Thavnair on my way to infiltrate the Empire, and though I'm not qualified to give a guided tour, I did gain a sense of where things lie.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001640_ESTINIENああ、サベネア島なら、
帝国に潜入したときに経由したからな。
案内できるほどじゃないが、多少は土地勘がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001650_THANCRED<tab>I'll be happy to have you along then. So for this group, it will be you, me, and Urianger.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001650_THANCREDそいつは頼もしい。
なら、こっちは俺とお前、それにウリエンジェで決まりだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001660_KRILE<tab>Give me a moment afterwards, and I'll supply you with all the details of Nidhana's request.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001660_KRILEじゃあ、依頼の詳細をまとめたものを、
このあとサンクレッドさんに渡すわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001670_KRILE<tab>Consider this hall our rendezvous point once our respective tasks are complete. May our investigations prove fruitful!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001670_KRILEそれぞれの調査が終わったら、
またこのメインホールに集合しましょう。
お互いに、収穫があることを願ってるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001680_ALISAIE<tab>When our father disowned us, I couldn't believe what I was hearing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001680_ALISAIE……お父様に勘当を言い渡されたこと、
別に、冗談だと思ってたわけじゃないのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001690_ALISAIE<tab>It wasn't until much later that his words began to sink in. That I began to feel the weight of what it meant.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001690_ALISAIEただ、実感はしてなかったのかも。
あんな扱いを受けて、今やっと身に染みてきたっていうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001700_ALISAIE<tab>Do you remember when the decision was made to come to Sharlayan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001700_ALISAIE<tab>シャーレアンに行こうって決めたときのこと、覚えてる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001710_ALISAIE<tab>G'raha said that the Forum was determined to keep us in the dark, and that Father's venomous “performance” was part of that strategy. To keep us at arm's length.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001710_ALISAIEラハが、ただならない事態が起きてるからこそ、
お父様はあんな突き放し方をしたのかも……って。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001720_ALISAIE<tab>Perhaps it was. Father argued with Grandfather on many occasions, but never with such...dismissive contempt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001720_ALISAIE実際、そうなのかもしれない。
頭が固くて、お祖父様とは何度も喧嘩してた人だけど、
「血を流すがいい」だなんて、決して言わなかったもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001730_ALISAIE<tab>And...when he demanded what justifies the sacrifices we make in war...I honestly didn't know what to say.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001730_ALISAIEでもね……
戦うことが正しいのかって問いに答えられなかったのも本当。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001740_ALISAIE<tab>Neither did Alphinaud, I know, but...never, for one moment, did I believe we had made the wrong choice. So all I could do was fume silently.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001740_ALISAIEそのことでアルフィノは思い悩んでたけど、
私は、進んできた道を間違いだなんて思えなかった。
だからただ怒って、反発して……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001750_ALISAIE<tab>It was only afterwards that I realized how childish I had been. How being stubborn and self-righteous must run in the family.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001750_ALISAIEそっちの方がタチ悪いわよね。
少し見方を変えたら、自分も頑固で独善的なのかもって、
あとになってからふと気づいたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001760_ALISAIE<tab>If I could've just mustered a civil response, then things might've turned out differently...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001760_ALISAIEあのとき、あの問いになんて答えたら、
自分もお父様も裏切らずにいられたんだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001770_ALISAIE<tab>They must be ferrying goods to Labyrinthos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001770_ALISAIE中に入っていった……
ってことは「ラヴィリンソス」への搬入ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001780_ALISAIE<tab>A vast complex beneath the island.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001780_ALISAIE<tab>ああ、この島の地下にある、大きな施設のことよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001790_ALISAIE<tab>Sharlayan is famous for archiving knowledge from around the world. Well, that knowledge is not preserved exclusively in dusty tomes and desiccated samples.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001790_ALISAIEシャーレアンといえば、世界中から知識を集めてるでしょ？
それはなにも、紙や試験管に収まるものだけじゃないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001800_ALISAIE<tab>Our “living” library─comprised of all manner of flora and fauna─is housed and studied within that underground facility.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001800_ALISAIE動物や植物、さまざまな「命ある資料」を、
生きたまま保管、研究する……
それがラヴィリンソスってわけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001810_ALISAIE<tab>...Still, that did seem to be an unusually large shipment. When I lived here, it was rare to even see such cargo transported by boat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001810_ALISAIEにしても、かなりの荷物だったわね。
私が住んでたころは、舟を使うような搬入自体、
滅多に見なかったのに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001820_ALISAIE<tab>Wait. Didn't you hear something in the Last Stand about the gleaners coming and going more than usual?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001820_ALISAIE……ラストスタンドで聞き込みをしてくれたとき、
グリーナーの出入りが頻繁になってるって話があったのよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001830_ALISAIE<tab>I think they're the ones we saw manning those boats. And gleaners answer to the Forum...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001830_ALISAIEさっきの舟に乗ってたのも、多分、グリーナーだわ。
それも、ラヴィリンソスに搬入を行える、
議会公認のグリーナー……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001840_ALISAIE<tab>If the appearance of the Telophoroi prompted this sudden burst of activity, then Labyrinthos may hold a clue as to what the Forum is planning!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001840_ALISAIE彼らの動きが最近……
テロフォロイが現れたころから活発になっているなら、
そこに哲学者議会の思惑が隠れてるかも！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001850_EMETSELCH<tab>Deep beneath the scholars' city shines a false sun within a fabricated sky.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001850_EMETSELCH学術都市の地下深く
そこには 偽りの空がある

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001860_EMETSELCH<tab>In any age exist those who consider the floor an extension of their bookshelves, and this vault's architects surely belonged to that special breed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001860_EMETSELCHあふれた資料を床に積む者は どんな時代にも存在したが
この施設の考案者も 確実にそのクチだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001870_EMETSELCH<tab>If the stack grows too high, start a new one. If no room remains, then make more rooms.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001870_EMETSELCH積めなくなれば 別の場所へ
空きもなければ 作ってしまえというわけだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001880_EMETSELCH<tab>A simple solution at first. And then, bit by bit...a profound transformation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001880_EMETSELCH恐らく最初はそれだけのこと
それだけのことが――すり替えられた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001890_EMETSELCH<tab>Knowledge buried beneath knowledge─a growing, creeping labyrinth from which there is no escape.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001890_EMETSELCH知識は黙々と積まれていく
まるで抜け出すことのできない 迷宮を築くかのように

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001900_KRILE<tab>Not what you expected? I must admit, the artifice is very convincing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001900_KRILEふふ、驚いた？
本物みたいな空だけど、造り物よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001910_KRILE<tab>But I assure you that we are beneath Sharlayan itself. The breeze you feel, the flowing waters you hear─all created by the hand of man.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001910_KRILEここは正真正銘、シャーレアン島の地下。
感じる風も、流れる水も、人の力で造りだしたものなの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001920_YSHTOLA<tab>The island is volcanic, you see, and once upon a time this great hollow must have been a reservoir for magma.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001920_YSHTOLAシャーレアン島は火山島……
この空間は、大昔の溶岩溜まりだったのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001930_YSHTOLA<tab>It was discovered some four hundred years ago, at which point it was repurposed as a storage facility for scrolls and samples and such. Renovations have continued with nigh on no interruption to this day, with the lower levels still undergoing expansion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001930_YSHTOLAそれを400年ほど前に見つけて、
資料や生体サンプルを保管する場所として改築してきた。
深部は今なお拡張されていると聞くわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001940_ALISAIE<tab>Aren't those people gleaners?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001940_ALISAIE<tab>ねえ、あれ、グリーナーの人たちじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aye, judging by their dress. They are said to work alone, as a rule, but 'twould seem that rule is being enthusiastically broken today.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001950_ALPHINAUD格好からして、そのようだね。
彼らは単独行動している印象が強いが……
今日はずいぶん集まっているようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>It may be as you suspected─that they are engaged in a task apart from the norm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001960_ALPHINAUD君たちが予想したとおり、
いつもとは違った仕事をしているのかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001970_ALISAIE<tab>Let's spread out and get some answers, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001970_ALISAIE<tab>さっそく、手分けして話を聞いてみましょう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001980_KRILE<tab>Ugh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001980_KRILE<tab>っ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001990_KRILE<tab>Did you call to me just now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_001990_KRILE<tab>……今、私を呼んだかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002000_KRILE<tab>No? How odd. I must be a bit dizzy from the descent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002000_KRILE気のせい……？
昇降機で急に下がってきたからかしら……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002010_KRILE<tab>I-I'll be fine, I'm sure. Let's get to work, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002010_KRILE<tab>ごめんなさい、お互いに情報収集がんばりましょ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002020_ERENVILLE<tab>A fair shot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002020_ERENVILLE<tab>へぇ、上手いもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002030_ERENVILLE<tab>Nicely done! Let me truss this one up, and I'll make my way over to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002030_ERENVILLE手伝い、ありがとよ！
あいつを保護してから上がるから、そのへんで待っててくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002040_KRILE<tab>There you are. Any new revelations?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002040_KRILEここにいたのね。
何か有力な情報はあった……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002050_ALISAIE<tab>So you met with that gleaner again, this time to...capture a hornbill?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002050_ALISAIE<tab>さっきのグリーナーと再会して、ホーンビルを……ねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002060_ALISAIE<tab>I understand catching and bringing in creatures from the outside, but what's the point of chasing after ones already here?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002060_ALISAIE外で捕まえた生き物を運んでくるのはわかるけど、
ラヴィリンソスの中で捕まえて、どうするのかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002070_ERENVILLE<tab>Oh, it's a simple thing, really.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002070_ERENVILLE<tab>なに、珍しいことでもないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002080_ERENVILLE<tab>Occasionally, we remove specimens no longer needed for study, or those we've had difficulty raising. But we can't simply turn them loose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002080_ERENVILLE観察を終えたり、ここでの育成が難しかった動植物は、
運び出されることがあるんだよ。
野生に返す以上、条件は厳しいけどな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002090_ERENVILLE<tab>Safely returning such creatures to their native habitats is another facet of a gleaner's duties.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002090_ERENVILLEそれを丁重に故郷へお届けするのも、
俺らグリーナーの仕事ってわけさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002100_ERENVILLE<tab>But not in this case, I'm afraid. I've been asked to bring the bird “below.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002100_ERENVILLEただまあ、今回に関しては、運ぶ先が違う。
頼まれてるのは……「下」への移送だからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002110_YSHTOLA<tab>The restricted section in the lower levels of Labyrinthos. Open only to a select few researchers handpicked by the Forum.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002110_YSHTOLA……ラヴィリンソスの下層には、
哲学者議会に指名された研究者のみが立ち入れる区画がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>The projects down there are the subject of rumor and hearsay. Forbidden magicks. Advanced technologies that can never be allowed to fall into outside hands. Even Archons are not privy to the truth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002120_YSHTOLA他国に決して明かせない先端技術や、
禁忌魔法を研究しているとも噂されているけれど……
私たち賢人ですら、真実を窺い知ることはできない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002130_YSHTOLA<tab>Those who are─the researchers involved in this secretive work─are not permitted to walk freely in the city, and are instead required to live in isolated quarters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002130_YSHTOLAそこで働く研究員たちを専用の施設に住まわせ、
街に出さないくらいの徹底ぶりだもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>What could a facility subject to such strict security protocols possibly need with a hornbill? An...an experiment?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002140_ALPHINAUDそんな場所に、なぜホーンビルを？
研究に必要なのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002150_ERENVILLE<tab>Possibly. I wasn't afforded an explanation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002150_ERENVILLEさて……
依頼主の哲学者議会からは、説明がなかったもんでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002160_ERENVILLE<tab>But judging by the requisition list given to me and my colleagues, I doubt it's for any kind of advanced research.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002160_ERENVILLEただ、俺や仲間に渡されてる、
内外から「下」へ運ぶ対象のリストを見ると、
最先端の研究のためって感じじゃないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002170_ERENVILLE<tab>I'd be more inclined to believe we were making preparations to migrate to the south. Meracydia or thereabouts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002170_ERENVILLEどちらかといえば、
南方大陸に乗り込む準備とでも言われた方が、しっくりくる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002180_ALISAIE<tab>What? Why would you say that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002180_ALISAIE<tab>どういうこと……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002190_ERENVILLE<tab>Much of the flora and fauna we were asked to procure could serve as reliable sources of sustenance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002190_ERENVILLE運び込むように指示されてるのは、
安定した食料供給を見込めそうな動植物……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002200_ERENVILLE<tab>They're comparatively hardy species, too. Able to endure harsh climates. And among them are specimens known to be effective in improving soil quality and purifying water.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002200_ERENVILLEそれに比較的変化に強い種や、過酷な環境への耐性があるもの。
土壌や水質の改善に用いられる奴らもだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002210_ALISAIE<tab>When you put it that way, migration does sound like a reasonable assumption.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002210_ALISAIE確かに……。
まるでどこかに入植しようとしてるみたいね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002220_ERENVILLE<tab>That's all it is, though─an assumption. Through our tasks, we gleaners glimpse only bits and pieces of the Forum's plans.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002220_ERENVILLEもっとも、根拠のない憶測だけどな。
グリーナーが触れてるのは、思惑のほんの一角だろうさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002230_ERENVILLE<tab>Our prime concern is that our requisitions, be they living or otherwise, are properly preserved for the knowledge of future generations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002230_ERENVILLE俺らはただ、運んだものが、
正しく知識として残されることを願うだけだ。
物であれ、命であれな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002240_ERENVILLE<tab>Now, I really must be going. I regret that I cannot reward you as you deserve.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002240_ERENVILLEってことで、俺はもう行く。
大した礼もできなくて悪いな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002250_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps you might reward us after a fashion, then? It is imperative that we reach the lower levels.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002250_YSHTOLAねえ、ものは相談なのだけれど……
私たち、下の階層におりられなくて困ってるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002260_YSHTOLA<tab>And seeing as you are already set to descend with your assigned cargo, mayhap we could accompany you as your...assistants?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002260_YSHTOLAあなたが「下」へ動物たちを納めにいくなら、
同行者として連れていってもらえないかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002270_ERENVILLE<tab>I am afraid that won't be possible. Once the animals have been prepared for transport, we send them down separately via the lift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002270_ERENVILLEいや、悪いがそれは難しいな。
動物たちは、そろい次第リフトで送ることになってる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002280_ERENVILLE<tab>I will, of course, follow after to make my report, but I can hardly pass you off as porters when there is nothing left to carry.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002280_ERENVILLEそのあと、俺も報告のために下りはするが……
そこに至って、荷物持ちだと紹介するわけにもいかないだろ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002290_YSHTOLA<tab>...Indeed. Pray forget I said anything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002290_YSHTOLA<tab>……ごもっともね、忘れて頂戴。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002300_ERENVILLE<tab>How do you feel about climbing? If you've strength and the courage to brave it, then there is another way down.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002300_ERENVILLEおたくら、腕と足腰に自信はあるか？
もしそうなら、下りる方法がないわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002310_ERENVILLE<tab>This path leads to the thirty-third facet─a mineshaft excavated during one of our expansions of Labyrinthos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002310_ERENVILLEこの道の先に、「第三十三期拡張坑道」がある。
ラヴィリンソスを拡張すると同時に、
鉱物資源を得るための場所さ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002320_ERENVILLE<tab>While I cannot guarantee that the passage is safe to traverse, it should provide access to the Medial Circuit below.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002320_ERENVILLE安全は確保されてないが、そこを通れば、
ミディアルサーキットまでは下りられるはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002330_KRILE<tab>I never even knew such a place existed! Thank you, this is the perfect solution.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002330_KRILEそれは私も初耳よ！
貴重な情報、助かるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002340_ERENVILLE<tab>You're quite welcome, but consider yourselves warned. If the going proves too treacherous, you'd do well to turn back. I bid you good day.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002340_ERENVILLEドウイタシマシテ、だが行くのは自己責任だぞ。
難しいと思ったらやめておけよ。
……それじゃあな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002350_ALISAIE<tab>Well, turning back is hardly an option, not when we've come this far. Let's go and take a look at this mineshaft.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002350_ALISAIEここで行かないって選択肢はないわよね。
ともかく坑道の様子を見てみましょ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002360_BOTANISTMAN<tab>(-???-)Hard to look away, isn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002360_BOTANISTMAN<tab>おや、その花が気になるかね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002370_BOTANISTMAN<tab>But they're more than pretty flowers. “Heartblooms” are attuned to ambient emotion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002370_BOTANISTMANとても綺麗な花だろう。
私たちは、「人の心を映す花」と呼んでいるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002380_BOTANISTMAN<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002380_BOTANISTMAN<tab>ふぅ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002390_BOTANISTMAN<tab>You don't seem convinced. But believe me, it's true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002390_BOTANISTMANはは、胡散臭いと思ってるだろう。
だが本当なのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002400_BOTANISTMAN<tab>This ashen grey, for instance. It mirrors the anxiety and urgency of those working nearby as they rush to fulfill sudden orders.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002400_BOTANISTMAN今は灰色か……。
ここで働くみんなの、急な命令に対する不安や焦り……
そういったものが表れている色なのかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002410_BOTANISTMAN<tab>Intense feelings like those spur the petals to change color. Bright, glowing hues in the presence of joy. Dark, subdued shades for frustration or despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002410_BOTANISTMANそんな風に、周囲の人がいい気分なら明るい色に輝くし、
苛立ったり落ち込んだりしていると、暗い色を帯びるんだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002420_BOTANISTMAN<tab>Yet even with the collected wisdom of Sharlayan at our disposal, we've yet to identify the underlying principle of this empathic effect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002420_BOTANISTMANその原理は、シャーレアンの叡智をもってしても、
いまだ解明されていないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002430_BOTANISTMAN<tab>And there are other mysteries besides. Although the flower is extraordinarily long-lived, its low reproductive rate has made it difficult to find younger populations growing in the wild.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002430_BOTANISTMANほかにも未解明な部分は多い。
とても長寿な花である反面、繁殖力が低くてね。
外では滅多にお目にかかれないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002440_BOTANISTMAN<tab>With too few sightings to map its distribution, and no closely related species to track, we've been unable to pinpoint its land of origin.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002440_BOTANISTMAN分布図を作ろうにも目撃情報が足りないし、
類似した植物もないことから、原産地は不明……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002450_BOTANISTMAN<tab>To further complicate matters, every culture even dimly aware of its existence has given it a different name and mythos. Our attempts to study it via the historical record have been an exercise in frustration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002450_BOTANISTMANかろうじてこの花の存在を知っている人々も、
それぞれに名前や伝承を与えているものだから、
正しい名前があるのかどうかすら、わからないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002460_BOTANISTMAN<tab>As an avid botanist myself, I should one day like to unravel the heartbloom's secrets...but I'm afraid other duties must take precedence. I will leave you to your thoughts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002460_BOTANISTMAN私も植物学者のはしくれ、いつかは解明してみたいと思うが……
今は荷運びを優先しなくちゃならないらしい。
それじゃ、もうひと仕事してくるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002470_YSHTOLA<tab>Have you learned aught of interest?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002470_YSHTOLA<tab>何の話をしていたの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002480_YSHTOLA<tab>A flower that reacts to one's feelings? Strange... I must say, I have never heard of such a thing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002480_YSHTOLA人の心を映す花、ね……。
聞いたことがないわ、確かにとても珍しいのでしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002490_ALISAIE<tab>This is all very fascinating, but as it stands, we've failed to gain any significant insight into the Forum's undertaking.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002490_ALISAIEそれはいいけど、哲学者議会の思惑については、
結局、誰も決定的な情報を掴めてないわけね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed... While there is certainly enough activity to support Erenville's supposition that a priority has been placed on improving food production...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002500_ALPHINAUDそうなるね。
エレンヴィルが推測していたとおり、
食料の生産力向上を狙っているかのような動きはあるが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Unfortunately for our investigation, these workers were never informed as to how their duties serve the master plan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002510_ALPHINAUDそれがどんな意図で行われているかまでは、
現場に知らされていない、といった風だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002520_ALISAIE<tab>Ugh. If only we could interrogate the Forum members directly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002520_ALISAIEはぁ……。
議員を問い詰められたら早いのに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002530_ALISAIE<tab>Isn't that the entrance to the Archeion?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002530_ALISAIE<tab>……ねえ、あれってアルケイオン保管院の出口よね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002540_ALISAIE<tab>Look, there... I think that's Erenville.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002540_ALISAIE<tab>今出てきたの……エレンヴィルじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002550_ALPHINAUD<tab>A little difficult to tell from here, but...but I think you're right. He did say he was coming down to make his report.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002550_ALPHINAUD遠目だが、確かに……。
あとで報告のために下りると言っていたから、それだろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002560_YSHTOLA<tab>Erenville receives his orders from the Forum. Would it not follow, then, that the superior to whom he reports is a Forum member─or at least a close associate?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002560_YSHTOLA彼の依頼主は哲学者議会。
だとしたら、報告の相手も、議員やそれに近しい者ではなくて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002570_ALPHINAUD<tab>You mean to eavesdrop on their conversation!? What of the risks?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002570_ALPHINAUD<tab>まさか、彼らの話を盗み聞きするつもりかい！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002580_YSHTOLA<tab>Ours alone to bear. We won't interfere with Erenville's work, nor will he be implicated as an accomplice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002580_YSHTOLA自己責任で見学させてもらうだけよ。
邪魔はしないし、共謀者に仕立て上げるつもりもないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002590_YSHTOLA<tab>If you're not comfortable taking part, I can do this alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002590_YSHTOLA<tab>気が引けるなら、私だけで行ってくるけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nay. I said myself that I wished to know Father's intentions. And no answers will be forthcoming should we simply ask nicely.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002600_ALPHINAUD……いいや、父の思惑を知りたいと申し出たのは私自身だ。
それが素直に問えば返ってくるものではないとも、
理解しているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002610_ALISAIE<tab>We can apologize later should it come to it. Right now, we need every crumb of information we can get our hands on. Consequences be damned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002610_ALISAIEマズいこと聞いちゃったら、あとでちゃんと謝りましょ。
今はどんな欠片だって集めた方がいいわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002620_YSHTOLA<tab>It might be best if you came along as well. In fact, we should all...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002620_YSHTOLAあなたも手を貸してくれると助かるわ。
それから……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>Krile?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>……クルル？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002640_KRILE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002640_KRILE<tab>っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002650_KRILE<tab>Oh! Yes! That certainly sounds like a plan!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002650_KRILEえ、ええ、そうね！
私もその作戦でいいと思うわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002660_YSHTOLA<tab>I'm glad you agree...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002660_YSHTOLA<tab>そう、ならいいけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002670_ALISAIE<tab>Quickly, Erenville is on the move. We need to get closer before we lose him!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002670_ALISAIEエレンヴィルが動くみたい。
追いかけるなら、そろそろ行かないと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002680_KRILE<tab>Almost. I can almost reach you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002680_KRILEあなたは、やっぱり……。
あと少しで拾えそうなのに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002700_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>I trust you will find your compensation to be more than satisfactory. We wish to make clear that we are pleased with the efficiency and thoroughness of your work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002700_REQUESTEDLEGISLATORでは、さきほど送られてきた分に対する報酬は確かに渡した。
君の仕事はいつも正確で、我々も助かっているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002710_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>So much so that we have come bearing new tasks in need of your competent hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002710_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR矢継ぎ早ですまないが、その腕を見込んで、
次の仕事も頼まれてはくれないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002720_ERENVILLE<tab>Another lengthy list.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002720_ERENVILLE<tab>……また、ずいぶん多いな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002730_ERENVILLE<tab>If I may speak frankly. The gleaners have been pushed to the point of collapse by your unending demands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002730_ERENVILLEなあ、最近のこの妙な動きはなんだ？
グリーナーの仲間も、急な依頼に疲れ果ててるぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002740_ERENVILLE<tab>We are not familiars to be exploited. We are Sharlayan scholars, and we deserve an explanation for this unseemly treatment. What warrants such urgency?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002740_ERENVILLE俺らは使い魔じゃない……知識あるシャーレアン人だ。
説明くらいは、してほしいもんだがね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002750_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>...In an age long past, Sharlayan was charged with a momentous duty.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002750_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR……シャーレアンには、
いにしえより受け継がれてきた、重大な使命があるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002760_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>And now that word of the Final Days hangs heavy in the air, the time has come for us to fulfill that charge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002760_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR終末の災厄という言葉が現代に蘇った今こそ、
その使命は果たされなければならない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002770_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>I can say no more, but I promise you this: all will be revealed in due course. And when it has, you will understand that your toil was in service to the greatest good.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002770_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR私が語れるのはそれだけだ。
ただ、遠くないうちにすべては明らかとなり、
君たちは、正しい行いに加担していたと理解するだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002780_ERENVILLE<tab>Then I will do your bidding. For now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002780_ERENVILLEひとまず仕事は承った。
……が、納得したわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002790_ERENVILLE<tab>But unless you wish the gleaners to rise up in protest, I advise you to offer tangible improvements for our working conditions. Your promised revelation does nothing to address present circumstances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002790_ERENVILLE俺らのボイコットが起きる前に、待遇をあげるなり、
「すべて」とやらを明かすなりしてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002800_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>A fair point. Your concerns will be conveyed to the Forum.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002800_REQUESTEDLEGISLATORああ……承知した。
では、引き続きよろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002810_ERENVILLE<tab>I hope that was informative. You may consider my debt to you repaid in full.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002810_ERENVILLE……まあ、いいけどな。
おたくらへの借りは、これで完済ってことで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002820_ERENVILLE<tab>While I do have my reservations about the Forum, I want to believe that they have our best interests at heart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002820_ERENVILLE俺は議会に手放しで賛同してるわけじゃないが、
命を運んできた手前、信じたいとは思ってる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002830_ERENVILLE<tab>Which is why I'm reassured that you're busy sniffing out the truth of things. We can ill afford to place all our eggs in one basket─this master plan of theirs─without first understanding the risks involved.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002830_ERENVILLEだからこそ、必死になって嗅ぎまわる奴がいてくれた方がいい。
全員が同じ船に乗ってたら、
嵐にあったとき、下手すりゃ全滅だからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002840_ALISAIE<tab>Wait, how did you know it was us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002840_ALISAIE<tab>ねえ、なんで私たちだってわかったの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002850_ERENVILLE<tab>If you mean to impersonate a toad, try studying the real thing. And don't try to fool an expert.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002850_ERENVILLE動きを見りゃ一発だ。
次までに、本物のトードをよく観察しとくんだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002860_KRILE<tab>For you. The spell will keep it from wilting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002860_KRILEこれを、あなたに……。
魔法をかけたから、当分枯れないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002870_KRILE<tab>She said you would need it for the journey ahead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002870_KRILE「彼女」から、そうしてほしいと頼まれたの。
あなたの旅には必要なものなんですって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002880_KRILE<tab>Will you speak with Her now? I cannot hope to match Minfilia's clarity, of course, but...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002880_KRILEそれじゃあ、しばらく「彼女」に代わるわね。
ミンフィリアさんほどは、うまくできる自信がないけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002890_KRILE<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)...Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002890_KRILE<tab>……ありがとう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002900_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)...Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002900_HYDAELYN<tab>……ありがとう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002910_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Do not worry. She has lent me her body for only a moment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002910_HYDAELYN驚かせてごめんなさい。
大丈夫、この子の身体はすぐに返します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002920_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Just as I could not save the First from the Flood of Light, it has become arduous for me to interact with the physical world without assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002920_HYDAELYN第一世界を「光の氾濫」から救えなかったように、
私だけで物質界に干渉するのは難しい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002930_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Though I might converse with you for a time, the incorporeal form I assumed on the ship would be incapable of casting even the simplest enchantment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002930_HYDAELYN先のような幻体では、言葉を交わせはしても、
花に魔法をかけることすら叶わないのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002940_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)It is in the depths of the aetherial sea─the place to which all life returns─where my influence is greatest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002940_HYDAELYNけれど、命の還る場所……星海のことならば。
思うがままとはいきませんが、多少は手が届きます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002950_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)After Minfilia's sacrifice on the First, it was to the sea, here in the Source, where I ferried her soul. I wished that gentle spirit to find rest in the world she loved so well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002950_HYDAELYN第一世界ですべての力を託し終えたミンフィリアの魂も、
掬いあげ、今はここ原初の海に……。
優しいあの子には、故郷で穏やかに眠ってほしかったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002960_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Her...and another who may yet have a part to play. Though that will depend on you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002960_HYDAELYNそして、もうひとり……。
その者に行き着くかどうかは、これからのあなた次第。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002970_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Take the flower. Walk free. For you are free─to go where you wish. To believe what you will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002970_HYDAELYN花を携え、歩みなさい。
願う場所へ……望むままに……信じて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002980_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)That bloom will be your guide. Test and proof of your conviction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002980_HYDAELYN<tab>それは道標であり、あなたを、人を試すもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002990_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)In darkness seek joy. Surrender not to sadness, and see beyond despair. Walk free, and bear the light for others to follow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002990_HYDAELYN暗闇のうちに、歓びを探すのです。
絶望に目を凝らし、哀しみを掻き分け、
前へと歩み続けた者だけが、その真なる輝きを得る……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003000_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Together, raise it aloft and let it shine. Till the end, blinding and radiant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003000_HYDAELYN<tab>どうか、みんなと、結末を照らして。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003010_KRILE<tab>That was...all too brief. Already She seems so far away...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003010_KRILE時間切れ……みたい……。
彼女の気配が遠くなっちゃった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003020_KRILE<tab>My apologies if I startled you. Ever since we began our descent into Labyrinthos, I had sensed another's will, straining to reach out.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003020_KRILE心配かけて、ごめんなさい。
実は、ラヴィリンソスに下りてきたあたりから、
誰かの意思が働きかけてくるのを感じていたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003030_KRILE<tab>Even with my particular talents, though, I was unable to make a connection at first. So weak and tenuous it was...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003030_KRILEとても弱々しくて、私の「超える力」でも、
すぐには拾えなかったんだけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003040_KRILE<tab>Once I took hold of that wispy thread, imagine my surprise to discover it was Hydaelyn Herself! Needless to say, it seemed wise to learn what we could before letting go.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003040_KRILEやっと捉えたら、ハイデリンだっていうんですもの！
事情を聞ければと思って、一時的に協力したの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003050_KRILE<tab>Her answers were more cryptic than I would have liked... But at least She left us with a guide of sorts─that unusual flower.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003050_KRILEすべてを解き明かすには至らなかったけど、
花を……彼女が道標と呼んだものを手に入れることができた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003060_KRILE<tab>Yes, we are definitely making progress!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003060_KRILE<tab>うん、一歩前進としましょう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003070_ALISAIE<tab>You can't be serious! We've done nothing wrong!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003070_ALISAIE馬鹿なこと言わないで！
私たち、何もしてないでしょ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003080_KRILE<tab>Master Fourchenault!? What business has the Forum with us?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003080_KRILEフルシュノ様！？
どうして哲学者議会が……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>Obstruction and suppression, apparently.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>彼ら、私たちをお迎えにきたそうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003100_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Mistress Baldesion. Our records show you facilitated the Scions' entrance into Sharlayan by claiming them as assistants for your organization.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003100_FOURCHENAULTバルデシオン委員会の臨時代表だな。
己の組織を盾にして、「暁の血盟」を招き入れたとか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003110_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We are aware of your “investigations.” After alerting the major institutions to the presence of potential troublemakers, we received word from an Archeion custodian.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003110_FOURCHENAULT議会はすでに事態を把握している。
主要な機関にも警告をしたところ、
アルケイオン保管院の職員から連絡を受けたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003120_FOURCHENAULT<tab>A group operating under the auspices of the Students skulking about Labyrinthos and engaging in clandestine behavior.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003120_FOURCHENAULTバルデシオン委員会を名乗る者が、
ラヴィリンソスに探りを入れようとしている、とな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003130_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Clandestine”? We may not have entered Sharlayan as Scions, but we did naught to conceal our identities.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003130_ALPHINAUD……私たちに、悪しき企みはありません。
だからこそ「暁」とは名乗らずとも、
名を明かして帰国しています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our only purpose in this city is to seek the truth. I can think of no reason why our actions should warrant the Forum's intervention.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003140_ALPHINAUDこうして知の都に足を踏み入れたのは、
ただ、真実を求めてのこと。
議会に介入されるような問題は起こしていないはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003150_FOURCHENAULT<tab>'Tis not our way to discourage the pursuit of knowledge. But the timing of such pursuits must be considered, not to mention their potential impact.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003150_FOURCHENAULT無論、知の探究を拒むシャーレアンではない。
だが、時と場合、そして立場を考えてもらう必要はある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003160_FOURCHENAULT<tab>With the world in chaos, we, the true caretakers of wisdom, have committed ourselves to an undertaking that demands the utmost discretion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003160_FOURCHENAULT我らは真に賢き者として、世が乱れた今こそ、
緻密な計画のもとに行動している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003170_FOURCHENAULT<tab>And we will not risk its success by turning a blind eye to disruptive foreign elements in our midst.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003170_FOURCHENAULTそこに人心を乱す異分子が紛れ込むのは、
それ自体が妨害にあたるのではないかね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>What, then, is to be our fate? Will you put us on a ship back to Eorzea?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003180_YSHTOLA……私たちをどこへ連れていく気？
船に乗せてエオルゼアに送り返すつもりかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003190_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The Forum will convene to examine your case. The results of said inquiry will determine your future in this city.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003190_FOURCHENAULTお前たちを、議会の緊急査問会にかける。
お引き取りを願うかどうかは、その結果次第だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003200_FOURCHENAULT<tab>As for your absent companion, he has already been detained.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003200_FOURCHENAULT<tab>すでに、大書院にいたお前たちの仲間も連行させてもらった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003210_ALISAIE<tab>G'raha!? But why? Is reading a crime now, too!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003210_ALISAIEラハまで！？
それこそ調べものをしてただけじゃない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003220_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Reading is encouraged. Celebrated, even. Not, however, of the volumes shelved in the restricted section of the library.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003220_FOURCHENAULT……本を読んでいたのが、
立ち入りを禁じられている禁書庫でなければな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003230_YSHTOLA<tab>Refusing to comply will only make matters worse. Let us instead treat this as an opportunity to open a dialogue with the Forum.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003230_YSHTOLA行かないとは言えないようね。
前向きに、哲学者議会と対話できる機会とでも思いましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003240_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Silence is often one's best defense. I would advise against prolonging the proceedings with frivolous discourse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003240_FOURCHENAULT沈黙は、ときとして雄弁に勝る。
いたずらに査問会を長引かせないほうが身のためだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003250_FOURCHENAULT<tab>But enough─this is not the place for debate. The Rostra awaits.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003250_FOURCHENAULTでは、我らが議会の開催地、
「哲学者の広場」まで、ご同行いただこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003260_GRAHATIA<tab>Forgive me. I was careless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003260_GRAHATIA<tab>悪い……不意を突かれた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>We would have been detained regardless. This way, at least, we manage to stay together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003270_YSHTOLAどのみち私たちは連行されたでしょうし、
こうして合流できただけマシよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>I trust your time within the forbidden archives was well spent?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003280_YSHTOLA……それで、禁書庫まで行ったからには、
それなりの成果があったのかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003290_BARNIER<tab>The Forum will come to order!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003290_BARNIER<tab>あー、皆の者、静粛に！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003300_BARNIER<tab>This inquiry is now in session. As Speaker Elect, I will be presiding over the day's proceedings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003300_BARNIERただいまより、緊急の査問会を開催する。
今期の議長として、私バルニエルが進行を任されよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003310_BARNIER<tab>Master Fourchenault. Would you be so kind as to restate the matter which compelled you to summon your colleagues with such urgency?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003310_BARNIERでは、査問会を提案したフルシュノ氏から、
審議すべき問題を、改めてご説明いただけるかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003320_FOURCHENAULT<tab>As you are all aware, we recently denied Eorzea's request for Sharlayan assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003320_FOURCHENAULT知ってのとおり……
我々は先日、エオルゼアからの協力要請を退けた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003330_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Since then, certain individuals dissatisfied with our decision have taken it upon themselves to interfere with our work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003330_FOURCHENAULTだが、その決定を不服としている者が、
不穏な動きをみせている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003340_FOURCHENAULT<tab>They entered our nation masquerading as associates of the Students of Baldesion, but these malcontents are better known as the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003340_FOURCHENAULT彼らはバルデシオン委員会の名のもとに入国したが、
実態としては「暁の血盟」だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003350_FOURCHENAULT<tab>These militants wield influence with both the Eorzean and Eastern alliances, and are inextricably involved with the crises presently afflicting the world at large.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003350_FOURCHENAULTかの組織はエオルゼア諸国、および東方連合にも影響力を持つ。
今回の騒動においても、渦中にある組織といえるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003360_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Loose in our city, these warmongers sought to meddle with and expose matters of state secret. What are they if not a dire threat to be expelled!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003360_FOURCHENAULTそんな存在が、我らがシャーレアンに乗りこみ、
国事を暴かんとしている。
これが脅威でなく、何であろうか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003370_LEGISLATORA<tab>You have tarnished the good name of the Students. Galuf would be ashamed...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003370_LEGISLATORAバルデシオン委員会の名を利用するだなんて。
ガラフ殿も浮かばれないでしょうに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003380_KRILE<tab>Galuf Baldesion was never one to forsake his fellow man.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003380_KRILEおじいちゃんは……
ガラフ・バルデシオンは、脅威と向き合い続ける人だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003390_KRILE<tab>Even if this nation closed every door and retreated from the world, he would have found a way to help the Scions─help every soul of this star─fight back against the coming doom.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003390_KRILE「暁」や各地の人々が、未知の脅威に挑もうとするなら、
たとえこの国がすべての門戸を閉ざしても、
必ずや、手を差し伸べていたでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>A terrible enemy stands poised to lay waste to all we hold dear. In the face of such madness, Eorzea reached out to Sharlayan, a respected ally, in the hopes of forming a united front.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003400_YSHTOLA今、世界には大きな脅威が迫っている。
そんな中でエオルゼアがシャーレアンに要請を出したのは、
この国を敬い、また志をともにできると考えたからよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Was your curt dismissal truly the best you could offer?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003410_YSHTOLAそれに対するあなたたちの返答は、
本当にあれでよかったのかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003420_YSHTOLA<tab> Or are you so preoccupied with your “momentous duty of an age long past” that even the end of the world is unworthy of your attention?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003420_YSHTOLAあるいは……その是非を問えないほどに、
「いにしえより受け継がれてきた重大な使命」は忙しい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003430_GRAHATIA<tab>Whence came this revelation?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003430_GRAHATIA<tab>そんなものがあると言ってたのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>From the mouth of a Forum member within fortuitous earshot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003440_YSHTOLAある議員がね。
彼らが聞いてきてくれたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>From the mouth of a Forum member within fortuitous earshot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003450_YSHTOLAある議員がね。
彼女たちが聞いてきてくれたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>Then it seems your findings support my own...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>なるほど……だとしたら、繋がったかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>The reason I visited the restricted shelves was to study records of the Forum's policy-making process. To better understand the historical trends underlying their most major decisions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003470_GRAHATIAオレが禁書庫に行ったのは、
これまでの哲学者議会の動きを知るため……
つまり、まつりごとに関する詳細な記録を見るためだ。
