source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>At first glance, the positions of neutrality in war and the accumulation of knowledge above all else appear constant and consistent─the unchanging pillars of Sharlayan society.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003480_GRAHATIA疑わずに読めば、一貫して、争いへの不干渉と、
知の集積を柱として営まれているように思える。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>And once upon a time, I might have left it at that. These days, however, I am more attuned to the subtleties of governance, and so I noticed something...odd.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003490_GRAHATIA実際、昔のオレならそれで済ませただろう。
だが……今は少しばかり、この手の話にも明るいからな。
おかしな点に気がついたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>From a particular point in time, the purpose of these policies shifted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>ある時期から、政策の方向性が変わってる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>No longer was knowledge preserved for the benefit of society. Rather, society was to be gradually reshaped to ensure the preservation of knowledge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003510_GRAHATIA生活のために知識があるんじゃない、
知識のために生活が敷かれていくようになったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>The most conspicuous and telling change was the one which befell Labyrinthos. Once little more than an oversized storehouse, an enormous allocation of funds saw it transformed into an advanced research and archival facility.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003520_GRAHATIA顕著なのが、ラヴィリンソスの変化だ。
それまでは巨大な倉庫程度の扱いだったのに、
膨大な資金を投じて、研究と保管の施設に変えられている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>I also discovered a fascinating account on the finances of our Dravanian colony.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003530_GRAHATIA低地ドラヴァニアの植民都市についても、
興味深い記録が残ってたぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>The settlement attracted students from far and wide, and the connections and tuition fees thus acquired were funneled into further improvements for the archives.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003540_GRAHATIAあの街には、各地から留学生が集っていた。
それによって得た繋がりと資金は、
ずいぶんと書庫や保管院を充実させるために使われたんだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>Now, there is no question that our nation's progress is tied to the acquisition of wisdom. Nevertheless, the vast resources diverted for this purpose borders on the obscene.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003550_GRAHATIA知識を増やすことが、
この国の発展手段だったことはわかってる。
だが……あそこまで比重を置くのは、異常だぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003560_GRAHATIA<tab>But returning to the matter of when─our change in course appears to have been made some two hundred and seventy years ago...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003560_GRAHATIAそして、そっちに舵が切られるようになったのは、
オレが読み解いた範囲では、270年ほど前からだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>The very same period when Sharlayan scholars in the hinterlands began a formal study of the aetherial sea!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003570_YSHTOLAシャーレアンにとっては、低地ドラヴァニアで、
本格的に星海観測を始めた時期……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>You found something, did you not? And whatever it was gave rise to your oh-so-important duty...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003580_YSHTOLAあなたたち、星海で何かを知ったのね。
それが、「重大な使命」の正体ではなくって……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003590_LEGISLATORB<tab>Mind your tongue, Archon! If you had seen─!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003590_LEGISLATORB軽々しく口にするなッ！
私たちは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Yes, we are bound by a duty we cannot ignore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>……確かに、我々には使命がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003610_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Knowing this, what would you have us do? Abandon our vital work, and join you on the field of battle?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003610_FOURCHENAULTだが、それを知ってどうする。
使命を棄てて戦えとでも言うつもりか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003620_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We will never choose the way of the sword. We will fulfill our mission not through strife and bloodshed, but survival.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003620_FOURCHENAULT我々は、決して武器を取ることを選ばない。
戦いではなく使命をまっとうするために、
生き残らねばならないのだ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Come what may, we shall live on. We must.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>星が滅ぼうとも……絶対に。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>Do as you must then. But we Scions will fight─until the heavens fall, until our last breath.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003640_YSHTOLAだったら、私たち「暁の血盟」は戦うわ。
世界が滅びを迎える、その日までね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003650_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Such misguided zeal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003650_FOURCHENAULT<tab>それだから毒されるのだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Father, I... Master Fourchenault.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003660_ALPHINAUD<tab>お父様……いえ、フルシュノ殿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003670_ALPHINAUD<tab>I fail to understand the stance you have elected to take. But by the same token, I have yet to find a compelling argument to counter the challenge you put to us in Gridania.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003670_ALPHINAUD私にはまだ、あなた方の考えが理解できません。
同時に、グリダニアであなたから掛けられた問いにも、
答えを得られずにいる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Still, in the midst of my uncertainty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>けれど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003690_ALPHINAUD<tab>I must trust in myself to do what is right. As others have chosen to trust in me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003690_ALPHINAUDけれど、迷いの中にいる私を、
それでも誇ってくれた友がいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003700_ALPHINAUD<tab>So I will continue as I always have, weighing the consequences of my every action, and allowing my hope for the future to inform my decisions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003700_ALPHINAUDゆえに私は、考えながら進み続けます。
自分の行いひとつひとつの意味を。
何を望み、何を選ぶのかを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003710_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>That's quite enough! Have you all forgotten the reason for this assembly?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003710_MONTICHAIGNEそこまでじゃ！
おぬしら、さてはここが査問会の場だと忘れておるな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003720_ALISAIE<tab>Scholarch Montichaigne. He's the head of the Studium, and an old friend of my grandfather's.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003720_ALISAIEモンティシェーニュ様よ。
魔法大学の学長で、お祖父様の友人なの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003730_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Honestly, every discussion devolves into some interminable debate. Terrible habit. Let's return to the topic at hand, hm?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003730_MONTICHAIGNE弁論を長引かせてしまうのは、ワシらの治らぬ悪い癖。
どれ、本題に戻そうではないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003740_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>By their own admission, these Scions have resolved to fight alongside the Eorzean nations against the doom which swift approaches.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003740_MONTICHAIGNE彼ら「暁の血盟」は、たしかにエオルゼア諸国と同様、
この事態と戦う決意をしているようじゃ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003750_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>But there exists no evidence of an attempt to incite our citizens to do the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003750_MONTICHAIGNEしかし、事実として、
我が国の者を扇動してはおらんのじゃろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003760_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Furthermore, while our decision may well've been the correct one, we cannot simply bull our way through these disagreements without inviting doubts or objections.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003760_MONTICHAIGNE加えて、ワシらの判断が妥当であっても、
このところのように強硬な態度で推し進めていけば、
疑問や反発も生じよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003770_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Put yourselves in their place! Who among you would leave a tome unopened if an elder forbid you read it with no reason given?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003770_MONTICHAIGNEほれ、己が身を振り返ってみよ！
「ダメだ、理由は知らなくていい」などと言われた日には、
禁書庫のひとつやふたつ、意地でもこじ開けようて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003780_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>No, if we're to quell further discontent, then we must conclude this matter with a fair and even hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003780_MONTICHAIGNEほかの者の留飲を下げるためにも、
ここはひとつ、寛大な措置で収めてはいかがかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003790_BARNIER<tab>Order! We will have order!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003790_BARNIER<tab>あー、静粛に！　静粛に！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003800_BARNIER<tab>Master Montichaigne raises some valid points. Keeping such concerns in mind, I propose we enforce the following measures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003800_BARNIERモンティシェーニュ氏の言うことも一理ある。
それを踏まえて、彼らの処遇を提案しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003810_BARNIER<tab>Until further notice, the Students of Baldesion are to cease any and all activities within the domain of Sharlayan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003810_BARNIERバルデシオン委員会は、当面の間、
シャーレアン領内での活動を控えること。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003820_BARNIER<tab>You will also refrain from any further investigation into the Forum's decisions and duties. Failure to comply with these restrictions will result in the immediate expulsion of your Scion associates.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003820_BARNIER加えて、哲学者議会の決定および使命について、
これ以上の詮索をしないこと。
もし守らなければ、協力者たちを強制送還する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003830_BARNIER<tab>Let us put this judgment to a vote. All in favor, raise your hand!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003830_BARNIERこの案で決を採るとしよう。
賛成の者は挙手を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003840_BARNIER<tab>I count fifty-one for, and forty-eight against. The proposal is passed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003840_BARNIER賛成51、反対48……
僅差ではあるが、さきほどの案で決定だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003850_BARNIER<tab>Students, Scions, you have heard the Forum's judgment. Pray abide by it or face the consequences.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003850_BARNIERでは、バルデシオン委員会の者と、
その協力者たる「暁の血盟」よ。
先の約束を、ゆめゆめ忘れず過ごすがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003860_BARNIER<tab>Honored members, I thank you for your time. This inquiry is concluded!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003860_BARNIER<tab>これをもって、本日の緊急査問会は終了とする！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003870_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>Welcome home, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003870_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>おかえりなさいませ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003880_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>Welcome home, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003880_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>おかえりなさいませ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>What? What are you gawping at?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>……何よ、珍しそうにしちゃって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>House Leveilleur in all its grandeur!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>これが名門ルヴェユール家……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Scion headquarters must seem squalid indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>今まで窮屈な思いをさせて……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Just admiring the craftsmanship.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>内装と調度品に興味がある

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003900_ALISAIE<tab>Oh gods, please don't! It makes me feel like a spoiled princess.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003900_ALISAIEそ、その言い方やめてよね！
たしかにうちだけど、私が建てたわけでもないし……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003910_ALISAIE<tab>I'll have you know I'm quite fond of the Rising Stones!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003910_ALISAIE急に何いってるのよ……！
私は「石の家」のことも、すっごく気に入ってるんだから！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003920_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, I...I suppose I never gave the décor much thought. I'm glad that you approve. I think.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003920_ALISAIEあ、そういうことね。
自分ちの飾りなんて、あんまり気にしたことなかったけど……
お眼鏡に適うものがあったなら嬉しいわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003930_AMELIANCE<tab>Lord Fourchenault is not to hear of this visit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003930_AMELIANCEみんな、この子たちが来たことは、
フルシュノさんには内緒にしておいてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003940_AMELIANCE<tab>And I should also like the children to have their gifts ere my husband makes his return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003940_AMELIANCEそれから、彼が戻ってくる前に、「あれ」を渡したいの。
急いで準備してもらえるかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003950_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>As you wish, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003950_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>承知いたしました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003960_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>Master Alphinaud, Mistress Alisaie, if you would accompany me upstairs...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003960_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>アルフィノ様、アリゼー様、どうぞお二階の方へ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shan't be long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>では、少し行ってくるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003980_AMELIANCE<tab>The twins have been sending letters home from time to time, recounting their latest adventures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003980_AMELIANCE実はね、あの子たちから、
ときどき近況報告の手紙をもらっていたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003990_AMELIANCE<tab>I am sure they withhold certain details, of course. If only to keep me from worrying...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003990_AMELIANCE親に宛てたものだから、
すべての出来事を書いてはいないでしょうけれど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004000_AMELIANCE<tab>Yet a mother worries all the same. In the early days especially, I tried to support them as best I could, sending the Scions coin and other such donations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004000_AMELIANCEそれでも、最初のころはすっごく心配だった。
だからせめてお金くらいはと思って、
「暁」に活動資金を送ったりしていたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004010_AMELIANCE<tab>Fortunately, they have found the strength to overcome adversity time and time again. Their words grow more confident with every letter, their depictions more vivid.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004010_AMELIANCE……過ぎてみれば、杞憂だったわねぇ。
あの子たちの手紙、どんどん活き活きとしてくるんだもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004020_AMELIANCE<tab>The triumphs and defeats. The joys and sorrows. 'Tis clear that they have come to find value in every experience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004020_AMELIANCE悪いことも良いことも、嬉しいことも、大変なことも……
きっとみんな輝いて見えてるんじゃないかと思うわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004030_AMELIANCE<tab>But of those they treasure most, it would seem that meeting you might be the most impactful. Why, since that fateful day, I do believe there has not been a single missive in which you were not mentioned by name!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004030_AMELIANCEとくに、あなたとの出会いは大きかったみたい。
あなたの名前が書かれていなかった手紙なんて、
ひとつもないんじゃないかしら！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004040_AMELIANCE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004040_AMELIANCE<tab>ふふふ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004050_AMELIANCE<tab>'Tis plain they care for you. And I am glad they have such a steadfast companion watching over them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004050_AMELIANCEどうかこれからも、
あの子たちを護ってあげてくださいね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004060_AMELIANCE<tab>Under normal circumstances I would offer you tea, but alas, these are anything but. In any event, why don't you keep me company whilst we await my children's return? Perhaps you might regale me with a tale or two of your exploits?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004060_AMELIANCEそれじゃあ、一緒にふたりを待ちましょうか。
お茶もお出しできなくて申し訳ないけれど……
よければ待つ間に、いろいろお話を聞かせていただける？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004070_ALISAIE<tab>When you mentioned gifts, I wasn't sure what to expect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004070_ALISAIE戻ったわよ。
いったい何を渡されるのかって思ってたんだけど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004080_ALISAIE<tab>Mother, I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004080_ALISAIE<tab>お母様……これって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004090_AMELIANCE<tab>Oh, look how well it fits you! And the style is to your liking?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004090_AMELIANCEよかった、ピッタリだわ！
あなたのお気に入りは、そういう服でよかったかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004100_ALISAIE<tab>It's perfect─exactly what I would have chosen! But please, tell me you had something different made for Alphinaud...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004100_ALISAIE……うん、すごくいい！　最高よ。
けど、アルフィノとおそろいにはしてない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004110_AMELIANCE<tab>Naturally! You are hardly little children anymore.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004110_AMELIANCEもちろん！
あなたもアルフィノも、素敵な大人になろうとしてる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004120_AMELIANCE<tab>And while I shall miss dressing you in those precious matching outfits, I must respect the individuals you have grown to become.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004120_AMELIANCEおそろいの服を着ていたころも、とびきりかわいかったけど、
今はそれぞれに似合いの服があるものね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004130_AMELIANCE<tab>See for yourself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004130_AMELIANCE<tab>……ほら！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you for the splendid clothes, Mother. Stylish, comfortable, and eminently practical!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004140_ALPHINAUDお母様、ありがとうございます。
とても着心地がよくて、実用的だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004150_AMELIANCE<tab>I am so glad you like them. They are, however, missing one final touch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004150_AMELIANCE気に入ってもらえて嬉しいわ。
実は、その服とあわせて、もうひとつ渡したいものがあるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004160_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>If you would allow me, Master Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004160_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>アルフィノ様、お背中、失礼いたします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait, are these...!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004170_ALPHINAUD<tab>これは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004180_AMELIANCE<tab>...A sage's tools of the trade. They belonged to your father.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004180_AMELIANCE賢者たちが扱う「賢具」よ。
もとはフルシュノさんが使っていたものなの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004190_AMELIANCE<tab>Though he may as well be chained to his desk these days, as a student, he was often called upon to venture into the field.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004190_AMELIANCEあの人、今では机にかじりついているけれど、
学生のころは、フィールドワークもしたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004200_AMELIANCE<tab>He wielded those armaments, both to heal and to harm, in no few battles. None so fierce as those you two have braved, perhaps, but battles nonetheless.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004200_AMELIANCEその賢具で戦いもしたし、自分や仲間の傷を癒したりもした。
あなたたちが身を投じているような、
本格的な戦いではないかもしれないけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004210_AMELIANCE<tab>Thus did I pull them out of storage─to show you that he was not always the man who stands in vehement opposition to you now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004210_AMELIANCE意見がすれちがっている今だからこそ、
それを知っておいてほしくて、倉庫から引っ張り出してきたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004220_AMELIANCE<tab>And also because it would be a terrible waste of ridiculously expensive, House Leveilleur-commissioned artistry.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004220_AMELIANCEそれに、ほら、ルヴェユール家が特注したものなら、
間違いなく上等品でしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004230_AMELIANCE<tab>I am told these devices are quite difficult to master, but someone of your extensive experience should soon have them darting about with grace and aplomb.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004230_AMELIANCE扱いが難しいとは聞いているけれど、
たくさんの経験をつんできたあなたなら、
きっと使いこなせるはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004240_AMELIANCE<tab>May the wisdom in that crystal serve you well. And please, try to find common ground with your father, that you might come and go without need for this awful subterfuge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004240_AMELIANCEその叡智が、どうかあなたたちを護りますよう。
そしていつか、お父様とわかりあって、
また気兼ねなくこの家に帰ってきてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004250_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will, Mother, I promise!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004250_ALPHINAUD<tab>はい、必ず……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004260_AMELIANCE<tab>My final gifts to you, before you run off, are an observation and a suggestion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004260_AMELIANCE<tab>さて、私から贈れるのも、あとは助言くらいかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004270_AMELIANCE<tab>Firstly, Fourchenault has ever been a serious man, but it was only after you were born that he truly lost himself in his work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004270_AMELIANCEまず……フルシュノさんは昔から真面目な人だったけど、
議員としての活動に心血を注ぐようになったのは、
あなたたちが生まれてからよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004280_AMELIANCE<tab>I may not know the Forum's inner workings, but I know your father's. The timing of that change in him holds some significance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004280_AMELIANCE私も哲学者議会の事情は聞いていないけれど、
あの人のことだもの、きっとそこに意味があると思うわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004290_AMELIANCE<tab>Secondly, do not seek to best your father with words.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004290_AMELIANCEそれから、もうひとつ。
お父様に言葉で勝とうと思わないこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004300_AMELIANCE<tab>Far better that you simply show him─let him discover the merit of your actions <var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> they cannot be undone!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004300_AMELIANCE見せちゃうか、やってしまってから事後報告が、
いちばん早いんだから！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004305_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004305_ALPHINAUD<tab>ハハ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004307_ALISAIE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004307_ALISAIE<tab>フフ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, Mother...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>もう、お母様ったら……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004320_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shall take your wisdom to heart. Thank you again for these gifts, and farewell for now!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004320_ALPHINAUD助言、ありがとうございます。
……では、いってきます！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004330_AMELIANCE<tab>Safe travels, my children. Eat well, stay warm, and keep your friends close.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004330_AMELIANCEはい、いってらっしゃい。
身体には気をつけて、みなさんと仲良くね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004340_KYTTE<tab>Right, we're all set!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004340_KYTTE<tab>……よぉし、これで準備万端！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004350_KYTTE<tab>Just the four of you, was it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004350_KYTTE<tab>送るのは4人全員でいいの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004360_ESTINIEN<tab>Three. I am already attuned to the crystal in Thavnair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004360_ESTINIEN<tab>いや、俺は現地で交感してるから、自力でとべる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004370_KYTTE<tab>You are? Oh. I would have preferred more test subjects...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004370_KYTTE<tab>えー……検体が減っちゃうのは残念だなー……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004380_KYTTE<tab>Oh well, never mind. If our three travelers could line up here, please?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004380_KYTTEま、しょうがないか。
それじゃあ、残りの3人だけこっちに並んでくれる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004390_KYTTE<tab>Yes, right there is fine! Take a deep breath, and I'll soon have you soaring through the aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004390_KYTTEそのへんでおっけー！
起動するから、リラックスして待っててね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004400_KYTTE<tab>Oh, and one last thing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004400_KYTTE<tab>……あっ、言い忘れてた！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004410_KYTTE<tab>You might experience a teensy-weensy touch of violent aetherial sickness. Good luck!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004410_KYTTEこれで転移すると、ちょーっとだけエーテル酔いがキツいから。
お大事にねー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004420_THANCRED<tab>Wha─?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004420_THANCRED<tab>なっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>Thavnair, home to city-state Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>ラザハンの都を有するサベネア島

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004440_EMETSELCH<tab>Rising from the southeast waters of the Bounty, this isle of plenty served as the battleground for a conflict between two peoples.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004440_EMETSELCH豊穣海の南東に浮かぶ、その豊かな島では
異種族同士の戦いと衝突が繰り返されてきた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004450_EMETSELCH<tab>Their cultures bled into one another until a unique amalgamation was distilled from the chaos, in a process not unlike their precious alchemy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004450_EMETSELCHその度に文化は混ざり合い 独自の発展を遂げている
さながら 彼らの用いる錬金術のようだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004460_EMETSELCH<tab>Once solidified as a single nation, an adamant stance of neutrality would hold invaders at bay. For a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004460_EMETSELCHひとつの国として安定してからは
中立を宣言し 侵略者を寄せつけずにいるが――さて

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004470_EMETSELCH<tab>Now across this vibrant isle creeps a fog of malice. What choice do you have...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004470_EMETSELCH極彩色の島を 悪意が塗りつぶし始めている
お前たちはそれを――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>...what chance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>それを――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>...against such an insidious foe?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>――本当にどうにかできるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004500_ESTINIEN<tab>I've seen fairer faces after a bout of bad shellfish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004500_ESTINIEN<tab>大丈夫……ではなさそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004510_ESTINIEN<tab>Let me bring you something to drink. That should help settle your bellies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004510_ESTINIENとりあえず、飲み物でも買ってくる。
そのまま待っていろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004520_THANCRED<tab>There was a note...with Krile's instructions...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004520_THANCRED<tab>なあ……クルルからの指示書に……書き添えてあったんだが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004530_THANCRED<tab>Don't let Estinien roam the markets alone... He's alarmingly bad with coin...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004530_THANCREDエスティニアンは金銭感覚がアレだから……
ひとりで買い出しはさせるな……だそうだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004540_THANCRED<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004540_THANCRED<tab>ウッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004550_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Mmm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004550_NIDHANA<tab>うぅん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004560_ESTINIEN<tab>What happened here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004560_ESTINIEN<tab>こいつは、いったいどういうことだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004570_THANCRED<tab>Their dress marks them as alchemists. I see no evidence of injury or poison.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004570_THANCRED装いは錬金術師に見えるな。
外傷はない、毒を受けたわけでもなさそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004580_URIANGER<tab>Thinkest thou they but slumber?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004580_URIANGER<tab>つまり、眠っているだけ……と？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004590_THANCRED<tab>I believe so. Whether it is by <var 1A 02 /var>choice<var 1A 01 /var> is another question entirely.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004590_THANCREDそうなるな。
故意か事故かはわからないが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004600_VARSHAHN<tab>(-???-)Oh, we have guests.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004600_VARSHAHN<tab>(-？？？？-)ああ、お客様ですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004610_VARSHAHN<tab>(-???-)You must excuse the poor welcome. Long days and longer nights have taken their toll, as you can see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004610_VARSHAHN<tab>(-？？？？-)すみません、みんな徹夜続きで限界だったみたい……で……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004620_VARSHAHN<tab>I am Varshahn. Servant to the satrap. My task was, in fact, to wake these good men and women. If you will allow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004620_VARSHAHN僕はヴァルシャン、ラザハン太守に仕える者です。
ちょうど彼らを起こしにきたところなので、お任せください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004630_VARSHAHN<tab>People of the Great Work! I come bearing new scales!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004630_VARSHAHN<tab>みなさん、新たな鱗を持ってきました！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004640_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Mmm... Scales...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004640_NIDHANA<tab>うぅぅん……うろこ……鱗……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004650_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)We have new scales!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004650_NIDHANA<tab>新しい鱗、来たの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004660_VARSHAHN<tab>Yes, my friends. Gather round. I have them right here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004660_VARSHAHN<tab>ええ、お待たせしてしまいましたが、追加の鱗をこちらに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004670_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>Oh, happy day! Now I can continue my experiment!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004670_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKAおおぉ、確かに！
これで研究の続きができる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004680_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>Many thanks!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004680_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>ありがたい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004690_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>One for me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004690_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>私にも！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004700_ESTINIEN<tab>Those are dragon scales.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004700_ESTINIEN<tab>……今のは、竜の鱗か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004710_VARSHAHN<tab>Yes─such materials are vital to their most pressing research.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004710_VARSHAHN<tab>ええ、彼らに進めてもらっている研究に必要なんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004720_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)And we are fortunate to have them. Our experiments are so close to bearing fruit...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004720_NIDHANAそのとおり。
アタシたちは、いただいた大いなる竜の鱗と、
ラザハン錬金術の叡智をもって、必ず完成させる……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004730_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Soon we will have a talisman capable of nullifying the aetheric emissions from that accursed tower!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004730_NIDHANA<tab>あの忌々しい塔からの、エーテル放射を打ち消す護符をね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004740_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Did...did I say something wrong? Are you not here with Varshahn? Wait, who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004740_NIDHANA……って、あれ？
その様子だと、もしかしてヴァルシャンの付き添いじゃないの？
キミたち、いったいどちら様……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004750_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Of course! You're the one Krile sent─the “Warrior of Light” we've been waiting for!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004750_NIDHANAえっ、じゃあキミが、クルルちゃんの紹介で来てくれた、
「光の加護」を持つ人なのね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004760_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>This is a day of celebration! Praise be to Cinduruva!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004760_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKAおお、なんて日だ！
マグ神に感謝を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004770_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>The winds have shifted. I feel it! The end to our toil is near!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004770_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>いい風向きだ……ついに完成する……そんな気がする……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004780_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>I feel it, too. My head hasn't been this clear in days...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004780_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKCほんとだねぇ。
ちょっと寝て頭もスッキリしたし！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004790_ESTINIEN<tab>Tell me, how did you acquire those scales?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004790_ESTINIEN<tab>竜の鱗は、どうやって手に入れた？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004800_VARSHAHN<tab>Curious that it concerns you so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004800_VARSHAHN<tab>……意外ですね、それを気になさるとは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004810_VARSHAHN<tab>But worry not. They were freely given by the dragon with whom our satrap has forged a lawful pact.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004810_VARSHAHNご心配なく。
あれは太守が正当な契約をもって竜から譲り受けたものです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004820_ESTINIEN<tab>...That is well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004820_ESTINIEN<tab>……そうか、ならいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004830_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>You must be quite familiar with dragonkin, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004830_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>もしかして、竜に詳しい人？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004840_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>Is this their congealed blood I see on your weapon?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004840_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>この槍を覆ってるの、凝固した竜血じゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004850_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>Hrm... Speaking of dragon blood...you yourself have been infused with it, have you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004850_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>ねえ、あなた自身も竜血を浴びたりしてない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004860_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>I should like to draw a phial or two, if so!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004860_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>だとしたら、フヒヒ……採血させてほしいなぁ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004870_ESTINIEN<tab>Now, see here...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004870_ESTINIEN<tab>おい待て、何を……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004880_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>Come along, come along! I must <var 1A 02 /var>insist<var 1A 01 /var> that you visit our laboratory!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004880_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKAよし確保ッ！
俺たちの仕事場にご招待だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004890_ESTINIEN<tab>Cease your shoving, or so help me...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004890_ESTINIEN<tab>やめろ押すな、引っ張るな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004900_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Oh dear, your poor companion. What with the new scales and your timely arrival, my colleagues are a little giddy with excitement.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004900_NIDHANA大事な仲間をごめんね。
鱗とキミたちが来てくれたものだから、
みんなちょっと興奮してる……かも？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004910_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)No harm will come to him, I promise! Meanwhile, shall we find a quiet place to talk?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004910_NIDHANAけど、貴重なサンプルなら、悪いようにはしないはず！
アタシたちは、その間に奥の部屋で話そっか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004920_NIDHANA<tab>As you may have guessed, I am Nidhana─the alchemist who sent the request to your Mistress Krile. We have workshops across the nation collaborating on this research project, but it is here─at the Great Work─where I collate our results.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004920_NIDHANA改めて、アタシは錬金術師のニッダーナ！
今回の研究には国中の工房が参加してるんだけど、
ここ「デミールの遺烈郷」でのまとめ役をしてるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004930_NIDHANA<tab>Come with me, all of you, and I can explain the crux of the situation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004930_NIDHANAしばらくの間、よろしくね。
それじゃ、みんなでついてきて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004940_NIDHANA<tab>Yes, that would be Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. Hardly anyone has been allowed in or out since our troubles with the tower began.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004940_NIDHANAそう、あれがラザハンの都よ。
残念ながら、塔ができてからは厳戒態勢に入ってるけどね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004950_NIDHANA<tab>The fearful citizens huddle inside the city walls, and commerce has all but ground to a standstill. I pity the satrap the trials he must be facing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004950_NIDHANAみんな、きっと不安に思いながら閉じこもってる。
商いも難しい状態だって聞くし、
太守様も、さぞ苦労なさってるんじゃないかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What can you tell me of the satrap?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>太守様はどんな人？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do you trust the satrap?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>太守様を信頼してる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004960_NIDHANA<tab>Well, he... He is the most important person in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004960_NIDHANAどんな……そうだねぇ……
ラザハンにおいて、いちばん重要な人かな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004970_NIDHANA<tab>Completely! Without the satrap and his line, Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han would not exist.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004970_NIDHANAもちろん！
ラザハンは、太守様の一族あってこそなんだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004980_NIDHANA<tab>Long ago, this island was home to two tribes of Matanga─the Gajasura, and the Arkasodara.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004980_NIDHANA大昔、この島には、二派のマタンガが暮らしていたの。
ガジャースラ族と、アタシたちアルカソーダラ族ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004990_NIDHANA<tab>When the Au Ra came to these shores, it was the Arkasodara with whom they joined forces. Together, they defeated the warlike Gajasura, forcing them to flee Thavnair altogether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004990_NIDHANAそのうちに大陸からアウラ族が渡ってきて、
アルカソーダラ族と手を結んだ。
そして、対立していたガジャースラ族を放逐したの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005000_NIDHANA<tab>Peace and prosperity reigned for a time, until a clan of Hyur from the mainland decided they wanted the island for themselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005000_NIDHANA以降しばらくは平和と繁栄の時代が続いたんだけど……
今度は大陸に住んでいたヒューラン族の一団が、
この島を乗っ取ろうとやってきたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005010_NIDHANA<tab>It was a direct ancestor of the present satrap who arbitrated that conflict, and welded the warring factions into the nation we know today.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005010_NIDHANAそのときに戦いを仲裁し、ひとつの国にまとめ上げたのが、
太守様のご先祖にあたるお方よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005020_NIDHANA<tab>And ever since, a member of that esteemed lineage has inherited this somewhat unique position. You see, by and large, the state is run by the people, but when problems arise, it is the satrap who mediates a solution.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005020_NIDHANA以来、途絶えることなくその一族が太守を務めてるの。
基本的には国を民に任せつつ、
問題が起きたら解決に手を貸してくれる……って感じかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005030_NIDHANA<tab>The stability provided by the satrap is what has allowed Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han to thrive all these years.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005030_NIDHANA地味といえば地味なんだけど、太守様がいてくれる安心感が、
ラザハンを発展させてきたんじゃないかって思うんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005040_NIDHANA<tab>And it was the satrap himself who entrusted us with this duty. We will not fail him, nor our countrymen!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005040_NIDHANAだからこそ、信じて依頼してくれた太守様のために……
何よりこの島に住むみんなのために、
どうにか成果を出さなくちゃ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005050_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>What is the delay with the vessel!? I told you, I need to adjust those ratios!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005050_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA土台の方はどうなってる！？
比率を調節するって言ってただろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005060_FANDANIEL<tab>I come all this way to admire one of my splendid towers, and what do I find? Fools attempting to ward off its tempering influence with magic trinkets.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005060_FANDANIELはてさて、塔の様子を見にきてみれば、
エーテル放射を遮断する護符なんぞを作っていようとは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005070_FANDANIEL<tab>I seem to recall a similar experiment in ages past. What <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> that man's name...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005070_FANDANIEL遠い昔にも、同じような試みを提案された気がしますが……。
なんでしたっけ、あの男……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005080_FANDANIEL<tab>“O” something... Oween?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005080_FANDANIEL<tab>オー……オー……オエーン？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005090_FANDANIEL<tab>Another body, another time. Who could be expected to remember every trivial detail...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005090_FANDANIELもう古い記憶ですからねぇ。
身体も変わりましたし、いちいち覚えてられないですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005100_AMON<tab>Another body, another time. Who could be expected to remember every trivial detail...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005100_AMONもう古い記憶ですからねぇ。
身体も変わりましたし、いちいち覚えてられないですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005110_AMON<tab>Hmmm. Allowing them to construct such handy talismans would be counterproductive to my plans...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005110_AMONしかし……ふむ……。
立場上、そんな便利道具を完成させられては困るものの……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005120_AMON<tab>And yet, I find myself deathly curious. How <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> they manage this feat with the limited knowledge and resources at their disposal?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005120_AMONこの程度の知識と技術でどうしようというのか、
見ものといえば見ものなんですよねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005130_AMON<tab>Complications be damned. For we cannot escape the nature of our souls. And I, as ever, am my own worst enemy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005130_AMON私のさがと申しますか、何と申しますか……
忌々しいこと極まりないですが、こればかりは、
魂にも性分があるって話かもしれませんね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005140_THANCRED<tab>I see our taskmasters have allowed you a moment's respite as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005140_THANCRED<tab>お前の方も、ひと区切りついたみたいだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005150_THANCRED<tab>You have to hand it to these alchemists─they are determined to see this endeavor of theirs succeed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005150_THANCREDここの錬金術師たちには舌を巻く。
絶対に護符を完成させようっていう気迫はすごいもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005160_THANCRED<tab>I've never been one for blind optimism, but I sincerely get the sense they're close to a breakthrough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005160_THANCRED俺はそっちの方面には明るくないが、
あの様子からすると、間もなく形になるんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005170_ESTINIEN<tab>They had better be, or all this effort was for naught...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005170_ESTINIEN<tab>そうでないと、とんだくたびれ損だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005180_URIANGER<tab>The peoples of Eorzea, of the Far East, of Thavnair... Children of this star united in common cause against a dire threat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005180_URIANGERエオルゼアや東方、そしてここサベネアの地でも、
人々はこうして脅威を退けんと尽力しています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005190_URIANGER<tab>Yet ere they succumbed to suicidal madness, were not the Telophoroi born of Her body, as were we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005190_URIANGER……されど、その脅威をもたらしているテロフォロイも、
いかな力を扱うとて、同じく人でありましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005200_URIANGER<tab>They who cling to life and the promise of the morrow's dawn, 'gainst they who desire death and an ending of their own orchestration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005200_URIANGER生を望み、明日を繋がんとする人と、
死を謳い、終わりを求める人が、せめぎ合っている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005210_URIANGER<tab>The victors of this war alone will hold the right to answer the question of existence. Of its meaning, and its worth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005210_URIANGERまるで、この戦いを以て問うているかのようです。
人という種は、生きていけるのか……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005220_THANCRED<tab>Poetic and ominous to a fault. That said, if it's an existential debate in nature, then our arguments might not be as persuasive as you'd think.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005220_THANCREDお前らしい。
事実そういう戦いなんだとしたら、
勝敗は紙一重になるかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005230_THANCRED<tab>Fandaniel wants to die, and take everyone with him in an orgy of pain and suffering. An utterly vile and unforgivable idea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005230_THANCRED周りを巻き込んで、傷つけて、苦しませて、死にたい……
ファダニエルの願望は、到底認められるものじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005240_THANCRED<tab>And yet, when spat upon by fate and wailing in the deepest pit of despair, who among us can say they have not entertained similar thoughts?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005240_THANCREDだが、誰だって、底の底にいるときは、
似たようなことを思ったことがあるんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005250_THANCRED<tab>There are nights black as pitch. Bereft of hope. When no words of comfort can reach you, and it's all you can do to grit your teeth and choke back the bile.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005250_THANCRED何もかもが疎ましくなって、
どんな慰めも、胸に届かない夜がある。
それをどうにか飲み下して生きちゃいるが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005260_ESTINIEN<tab>The more you see and suffer life's injustices, the more difficult they become to bear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005260_ESTINIEN上手くやり過ごせないときもある。
なまじ知性のある種族ほど、な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005270_ESTINIEN<tab>Vengeance is nurtured in similar soil. Though your anger has a broader focus, the sentiment is much the same: a fervent desire to destroy others; to see them drown in torment, as you have.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005270_ESTINIEN復讐なんてものも、結局はそれと同じことだ。
相手が絞られてるってだけで、
苦しみの沼の底で、他人にも破滅を願うわけだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005280_THANCRED<tab>That about sums it up. The will to endure is not always as strong as the urge to burn it all down and salt the earth, survival be damned. It's a struggle─often close and brutal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005280_THANCRED……そういうことだ。
必ずしも生きるという意志が勝つわけじゃないし、逆も然り。
そのせめぎあいは、大抵過酷で際どいものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005290_URIANGER<tab>Indeed... Well. I, for one, shall pray survival proveth more appealing in the end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005290_URIANGERなるほど……。
では私は、人がかろうじて生きるに足ることを願いましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005300_THANCRED<tab>As will I. Besides, our chances are much improved when we've the company of others committed to the cause of life. Our vengeful dragoon here is proof of that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005300_THANCRED同意見だ。
まあ、ひとりきりじゃないなら勝率も上がるさ。
復讐の竜騎士だって、だから今ここにいるんだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005310_THANCRED<tab>What is it? What did you see?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005310_THANCRED<tab>どうかしたのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005320_THANCRED<tab>Fandaniel? Are you sure? If he knows we've been working on a countermeasure...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005320_THANCRED……ファダニエルに似た奴を見た？
本物だとしたら厄介だな。
塔への対策を講じてることに、感づいたのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005330_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>It holds...the vessel holds! This is the one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005330_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKAおおっ、耐えきったぞ！
じゃあこれで……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005340_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>At long last!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005340_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>ああ、完成だ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005350_NIDHANA<tab>Look! We have finally created a talisman strong enough to withstand our experiments!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005350_NIDHANAああ、ねえ、見て！
ついに試験に耐えられるだけの護符ができたの！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005360_NIDHANA<tab>We've named it a “warding scale”─for the time being. With this in your possession, your soul should be completely shielded from corruptive aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005360_NIDHANA名付けて「護魂の霊鱗」。
持ち主を、エーテル放射による精神汚染から護ってくれるんだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005370_URIANGER<tab>Afforded such protection, any one of us may approach the towers without fear. Thou hast mine admiration─'tis an invention of historical significance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005370_URIANGERすばらしい……これで皆が塔に近づけるようになる。
まさしく、歴史を変える発明となるでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005380_NIDHANA<tab>I thank you for your kind words! But I would prefer you keep them unsaid until we test the talisman's efficacy in the field.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005380_NIDHANAありがとう！
でも、褒めてもらうのは、本番も成功させてからでないとね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005390_NIDHANA<tab>It is for the next stage of our plan that we summoned you in the first place: to accompany me to the Tower of Zot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005390_NIDHANAキミに来てもらったのは、このときのため……。
アタシと一緒に、「ゾットの塔」の前まで行ってほしいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005400_NIDHANA<tab>Should the scale prove effective─as I very much hope it will─then you'll have little to do. But should the effect be weaker than anticipated, I must ask that you restrain me. Or knock me senseless.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005400_NIDHANA霊鱗が十分な効果を発揮すれば、何も問題はないはず。
もし駄目で、アタシが精神汚染を受けたら……
ごめんね、捕まえるなり倒すなりしてもらえるかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Let's hope it doesn't come to that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>そうならないことを願ってる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Oh, you needn't ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>その程度、どうとでもなる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005410_NIDHANA<tab>Either way, we are fortunate to have you with us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005410_NIDHANAありがとう……。
来てくれたのがキミでよかったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005420_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>Nidhana, I... Are you certain you wish to do this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005420_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>ニッダーナ……本当に、いいの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005430_NIDHANA<tab>If others are to trust our creations, then we must have faith in them first. And as the senior researcher, it falls to me to lead by example.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005430_NIDHANAそんな顔しない！
自分たちの作ったものを、まずは自分で信じないと。
まがりなりにもまとめ役なら、なおさらでしょ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005440_NIDHANA<tab>But...should I fail to return, then learn what you can from this attempt and apply it to the next. Our work must continue. Is that clear?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005440_NIDHANAだけど、もし……もし失敗したら、その経験をどうか次に。
アタシたちの錬金術に懸けて、約束よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005450_THANCRED<tab>We'll keep an eye on the place while you're away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005450_THANCRED<tab>お前たちが出てる間、遺烈郷は見張っておく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005460_THANCRED<tab>Assuming Fandaniel is lurking about, there's no telling what mischief he has in mind for us─or you. Be on your guard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005460_THANCREDファダニエルが来ているとして、
どこに仕掛けてくるかは、わからないからな……
そっちも十分注意しろよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005470_NIDHANA<tab>Shall we be on our way? I'll have one of the soldiers at the hatchery prepare us a boat, and we can set out from the northern shore. I'll see you there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005470_NIDHANAそれじゃあ、行きましょうか。
牧場跡にいる兵士さんに船を用意してもらうから、
準備ができたら、北の海岸に来て。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005480_NIDHANA<tab>We should soon cross the threshold of the tower's influence...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005480_NIDHANA<tab>そろそろ、エーテル放射の圏内に入るはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005490_NIDHANA<tab>Any moment now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005490_NIDHANA<tab>お願い……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005500_NIDHANA<tab>It's working!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005500_NIDHANA<tab>ああ、よかった……ちゃんと防げてる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005510_NIDHANA<tab>And you─you are still yourself? Then I'd like to see how it fares closer to the tower, if we could.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005510_NIDHANAあなたも平気？
このまま塔の前まで進んでも大丈夫そう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005520_NIDHANA<tab>So far, so good. The scale's protection appears to be holding. If we can just make it to the tower's entrance...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005520_NIDHANA霊鱗にも、アタシ自身にも、今のところ異常はない。
このまま入口まで進めたら成功よ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005530_NIDHANA<tab>A few more steps!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005530_NIDHANA<tab>あと少し……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005540_NIDHANA<tab>Praise be to the Sisters! We made it! And the scale has proven itself to be everything we hoped it would be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005540_NIDHANA到着、そして成功だよ！
「護魂の霊鱗」には、みんなを護るだけの力がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005550_NIDHANA<tab>Now we can focus on production. Once we've equipped and returned with an entire survey team, this menace will soon give up its secrets!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005550_NIDHANAこれを量産すれば、本格的に塔を調査することだって……！
早く戻って、伝えなくっちゃ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005560_NIDHANA<tab>What─!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005560_NIDHANA<tab>何……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005570_NIDHANA<tab>Aaah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005570_NIDHANA<tab>きゃあ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005580_NIDHANA<tab>Let me go! ...Let me <var 1A 02 /var>go<var 1A 01 /var>! Rrrgh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005580_NIDHANA<tab>放せ！　放して……この……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005590_FANDANIEL<tab>Oh, do calm down. You'll only hurt yourself thrashing about like that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005590_FANDANIELはいはい暴れない。
足とかぶつけると痛いですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005600_NIDHANA<tab>Stop! You can't do this! Please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005600_NIDHANA<tab>嫌……止まって……アタシはまだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005610_FANDANIEL<tab>A little late for heroics, I'm afraid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005610_FANDANIEL<tab>残念、ひとあし遅かったですねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005620_FANDANIEL<tab>Hmm...the similarities are striking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005620_FANDANIEL<tab>ああ……なるほど……あれと同じか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005630_FANDANIEL<tab>My, my, such <var 1A 02 /var>hostility<var 1A 01 /var>. Never before has my artistry so displeased.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005630_FANDANIELうわ、睨まれている。
仕事とはいえ、不興を買ってしまいましたかねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005640_FANDANIEL<tab>My patrons of old would've positively squealed in delight! Though, between you and me, I find gushing praise exhausting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005640_FANDANIEL私の昔のお客様なんて、こういうのを見せると、
キャッキャッと猿みたいに喜びましたよ？
まあ、あれはあれで不愉快でしたが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Patrons of old?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>……昔の客？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What are you talking about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前はいったい何なんだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005650_FANDANIEL<tab>Allow me to tell you a story. Surely you've yet to hear the one about Fandaniel, the sundered Ascian.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005650_FANDANIEL私は、アシエン・ファダニエル。
以前も申し上げたとおり、転生組のアシエンです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005660_FANDANIEL<tab>I inherited the position─and the soul─of the Fandaniel who sat on the Convocation in the time of the Final Days. Theoretically speaking.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005660_FANDANIELかつて終末の災厄が起きたときに、
ファダニエルの座についていた男……
その魂を継いでいます、理論上はね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005670_FANDANIEL<tab>Practically speaking, that fact is of no consequence! I was born and lived as...well. Me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005670_FANDANIELけど、そんなの知ったことじゃない！
私は私として生まれて、時を過ごしていました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005680_FANDANIEL<tab>Eventually I was recruited into the Ascians and imbued with the former Fandaniel's knowledge and memories, but I never felt that they were truly a part of who I am.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005680_FANDANIEL紆余曲折あってアシエンに加わることになり、
「昔の」ファダニエルの知識ももらったのですが……
それが自分自身だとは感じられませんでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005690_FANDANIEL<tab>How to explain? Perhaps if I told you who I was before my Ascian embrace. Although that chapter, too, is a past I've long since discarded.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005690_FANDANIELだから、そうですね……さらに素性を明かすとしたら、
アシエンになる前の我が名をお伝えすべきかと。
あれももう捨てた過去ではありますがね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005700_FANDANIEL<tab>I have it on good authority you've poked your nose into an Allagan ruin or two, yes?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005700_FANDANIEL聞いた話によると、あなた、
アラグの遺跡調査でも活躍なさっていたのでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005710_FANDANIEL<tab>Then I expect you've heard of me. The old me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005710_FANDANIELなら、ご存知かもしれません。
私の旧い名は……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005720_FANDANIEL<tab>Amon, at your service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005720_FANDANIEL<tab>アモン、と申します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005730_AMON<tab>Amon, at your service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005730_AMON<tab>アモン、と申します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005740_AMON<tab>Imagine a nation of unbridled prosperity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005740_AMON<tab>かつて  繁栄を極めた国があった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005750_AMON<tab>Every need, met; day after day of unbroken, unshakable peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005750_AMONそこでは誰しも不自由なく
どんな時代よりも当たり前に明日がきた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005760_AMON<tab>Existence, fulfilled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005760_AMON<tab>そう  満たされていた――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005770_AMON<tab>And ripe for decay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005770_AMON<tab>だからこそ病んだのだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005780_ALLAGMAN<tab>You are a genius without peer, Amon. How ever do you conceive of such delightful experiments?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005780_ALLAGMANやはり君は天才だよ、アモン。
あんなおもしろい実験、どうしたら思いつくんだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005790_ALLAGMAN<tab>That fool was beside himself with panic when he awoke with the head of a bull! Even his cries for help emerged as so much guttural lowing!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005790_ALLAGMAN奴め、目が覚めたら牛の頭にされていて大慌て！
わめいても、出てくるのは汚い鳴き声ばかりときた！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005800_ALLAGMAN<tab>Oh, the memory of it... Haha, my poor sides! My friends and I were so consumed by laughter we struggled to breathe!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005800_ALLAGMANあれは本当に……ククク……
友人たちと一緒に、大笑いさせてもらったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005810_AMON<tab>No more than entertainment for bored wastrels ignorant of its worth. My all-consuming work...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005810_AMON私が心血を注いだ研究は 価値もわからない奴に
娯楽として浪費されている

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005820_AMON<tab>But it was not their only indulgence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005820_AMON<tab>いや  研究だけではないか――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005830_AMON<tab>For they were ever hungry for stimulation. Slaves to the slightest hint that amusement was afoot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005830_AMON人々は いつも刺激を欲しているのだ
些細なことさえ 追い回さずにはいられないほどに

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005840_AMON<tab>Our nation was ailing...but I would see the poison purged.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005840_AMONこの国は病んでいる
私はそれを変えるのだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005850_AMON<tab>I resurrected a legend─our first and greatest emperor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005850_AMON<tab>あの方を  伝説の始皇帝を蘇らせることで――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005860_AMON<tab>And just as I had planned, he set our wayward empire back on the path of conquest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005860_AMON私の目論見は果たされ 国は再び
前へ 外へと動き出した

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005870_AMON<tab>An inexhaustible ambition carried us onwards, always onwards.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005870_AMON<tab>決して醒めることのない  熱狂の中にいるようだった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005880_AMON<tab>Yet he who delivered to us such glory was not to be satisfied.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005880_AMONけれど 栄華を牽引する陛下だけが
ついぞ満たされることはなく――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005890_XANDE<tab>Heed me, Amon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005890_XANDE<tab>アモンよ、覚えておくがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005900_XANDE<tab>No matter how vast one's empire, or full one's treasure vault, all is rendered meaningless by death.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005900_XANDE果てまで覇を唱え、どれほどのものを得ようとも、
死はすべてを無に還す。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005910_XANDE<tab>In the end, all is lost...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005910_XANDE<tab>無なのだ、何もかも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005920_EMETSELCH<tab>You know as well as I that the emperor stands to lose this war. And so I have come to claim you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005920_EMETSELCHお前も察しているだろうが、この戦い、恐らく皇帝が負ける。
……だから、お前を召し上げにきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005930_EMETSELCH<tab>For while your methods leave something to be desired, we cannot deny the results of your work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005930_EMETSELCH正直やり方がどうかと思うことはあるが、
その知識と技術は、私たちですら一目置くほどだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005940_EMETSELCH<tab>And as fortune would have it, the seat of Fandaniel─your rightful seat─lies vacant and waiting. Take your place amongst your peers, rather than die a pointless death amidst the ashes of your doomed nation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005940_EMETSELCHお前が就くべきファダニエルの座も、ちょうど空いている。
みすみすこの国と心中させるくらいなら、
同志として迎え入れよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005950_EMETSELCH<tab>Send one of your clones to the Crystal Tower that you might see for yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005950_EMETSELCHクリスタルタワーの方には、お前のクローンでも送っておけ。
そして、確かめるがいいだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005960_EMETSELCH<tab>See what lies ahead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005960_EMETSELCH<tab>この先に、何が待つのかを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005970_AMON<tab>The fall of the empire affirmed the truth. Majestic and tragic...as the emperor foresaw.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005970_AMON栄華の末路が物語る
ああ あの哀れな陛下は正しかったのだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005980_AMON<tab>Scheme as you like, build as you will. Nothing endures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005980_AMON<tab>何を得て  何を築けど  やがては終わる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005990_AMON<tab>What is life, but a brief jaunt ending in emptiness?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005990_AMON<tab>生きるのはただ  無に至る道程でしかないのだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006000_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)So easily distracted! Why, I almost left without saying farewell.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006000_FANDANIEL(-ファダニエル-)わざわざ隙を作ってくださってどうも！
私はこのまま引き上げるといたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006010_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)As for your friend, you needn't worry─these pawns are far more useful to me alive as fuel for the primals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006010_FANDANIEL(-ファダニエル-)大丈夫、その獣人は蛮神を生み出すための貴重な資源ですから、
簡単に殺したりはしませんよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006020_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)Ah ah ah! If you attempt to pull them free, they <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> die, so─enjoy tackling that conundrum with your comrades!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006020_FANDANIEL(-ファダニエル-)ただ、無理に引っ張ると死んじゃいますので悪しからず。
せいぜいお仲間たちと頭をひねってくださいね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006030_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)We shall meet again! Not in one of these minor spires, oh no, but somewhere more suitably grandiose. Your favorite playmate is ever so eager to see you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006030_FANDANIEL(-ファダニエル-)ではでは、いずれまた。
こんな端末の塔ではなく、「大元」の方でお待ちしてますよ。
殿下と一緒にね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006040_EMETSELCH<tab>A vast rock squats upon Thavnair, and to its stony surface clings the city of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006040_EMETSELCHサベネア島に鎮座する巨大な岩
ラザハンの都は 奇妙にもそこにへばりついている

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006050_EMETSELCH<tab>Ye who enter here are subject to the scrutiny of gods─the gate's most watchful eye.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006050_EMETSELCH入口に掲げられた「真眼」の国章は
彼らの神話を彩る神々の眼――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006060_EMETSELCH<tab>The orb which beholdeth the truth of all things.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006060_EMETSELCH<tab>あらゆる真理を見抜くものとされている

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006070_EMETSELCH<tab>Pass beneath its hot and piercing gaze, bearing down like a second midday sun.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006070_EMETSELCHその視線を浴びながら門をくぐれば
島の暑さにも劣らぬ熱気を感じたものだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006080_EMETSELCH<tab>The fragrant haze a mixture of sweet incense and acrid smoke. The cries of merchants mingled here with lively melodies accented by dancers' feet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006080_EMETSELCH商人たちが客を引く声 踊り子の舞踏とともに響く音楽
香と窯からのぼる煙が 空気までも染め上げる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006090_EMETSELCH<tab>Travelers seduced by vivid sound and colors were once swallowed up by patchwork streets.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006090_EMETSELCHあふれる色に目を回した旅人を
継ぎ接ぎの路が 誘い込んで帰さない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006100_EMETSELCH<tab>But no such scenes to savor now. To what somber present does that divine eye bear witness?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006100_EMETSELCH――そんな風景も今は沈み
真眼は果たして いかなる真理を見ていることか

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006110_VARSHAHN<tab>Here we are: Meghaduta.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006110_VARSHAHN<tab>あれが、ラザハン太守の住まう「メーガドゥータ宮」です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006120_VARSHAHN<tab>It seems a shame to bring you here directly. Under normal circumstances, it would have been my pleasure to show you the sights.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006120_VARSHAHNただお連れするだけになってしまって、申し訳ありません。
こんなときでなければ、喜んで案内をしたのですが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006130_THANCRED<tab>And it would have been our pleasure to see them. Alas, it seems our tour of the city will have to wait.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006130_THANCREDこればかりは仕方ないさ。
ラザハン観光は、いつかの愉しみにとっておくとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006140_VARSHAHN<tab>I am afraid so. Come, we should head inside.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006140_VARSHAHNありがとうございます。
では、このまま館の中へ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006150_VARSHAHN<tab>Your Excellency, may I present our honored visitors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006150_VARSHAHN<tab>太守様、くだんの方々をお連れしました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006160_AWAHEEN<tab>(-His Excellency-)Ah, splendid, most splendid!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006160_AWAHEEN<tab>(-太守と呼ばれた男性-)おお、よく来てくださった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006170_AWAHEEN<tab>Allow me to introduce myself. I am Ahewann, satrap of Radz-at-Han.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006170_AWAHEEN私はアヒワーン。
ラザハンの太守を務める者です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006180_AWAHEEN<tab>Our alchemists tell me your assistance was invaluable in the creation of the warding scale.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006180_AWAHEEN遺烈郷の錬金術師たちから、「護魂の霊鱗」を作るにあたって、
あなた方の多大なる協力を受けたと聞いています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006190_AWAHEEN<tab>Such deeds ought to be recognized in person, thus did I have young Varshahn convey you here forthwith. On behalf of my people, may I express to you our sincere gratitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006190_AWAHEENそれについて直接お礼をと思い、ご足労いただいた次第です。
本当に、大変お世話になりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>But Nidhana, she was taken...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>でも、ニッダーナが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not everything went to plan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>喜べる状況じゃない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006200_AWAHEEN<tab>A regrettable incident, indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006200_AWAHEEN<tab>……ええ、その報告も今しがた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006210_AWAHEEN<tab>I assume you speak of Nidhana? A regrettable incident, indeed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006210_AWAHEEN……ニッダーナのことですね。
それについても、今しがた報告を受けています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006220_AWAHEEN<tab>Her colleagues insist that we honor her wishes, and trust in the talisman─that it will be instrumental in saving Nidhana and the others.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006220_AWAHEEN錬金術師たちからは、彼女の意志に報いるため、
何より彼女と同胞たちを救い出すために、
霊鱗を役立ててほしいと頼まれています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006230_AWAHEEN<tab>I am eager to hear your opinion on the matter, so let us not stand on ceremony. Come, sit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006230_AWAHEENそのことで、あなた方にもご意見を伺いたい……。
立ち話ではなんなので、どうぞこちらへお座りください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006240_ESTINIEN<tab>I think not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006240_ESTINIEN<tab>……待て。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006250_ESTINIEN<tab>This charade has gone on long enough. Show yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006250_ESTINIENそいつは囮だろう。
……そろそろ姿を現したらどうだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006260_AWAHEEN<tab>Forgive me, but were you expecting musicians perhaps? There are no performers waiting in the wings at present, but arrangements could be made if you'd prefer─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006260_AWAHEEN何をおっしゃいますやら。
生憎、その帳を上げるような催しは用意しておりません。
ご希望とあらば、またの機会にでも……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006270_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)Nay, he hath the right of it─the time for artifice is past. Raise the curtain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006270_VRITRA(-帳の奥から響く声-)いや、構わない……
試すような真似をしてすまなかった。
帳を上げてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006280_AWAHEEN<tab>As you wish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006280_AWAHEEN<tab>……承知いたしました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006290_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)You travel as assistants to the Students of Baldesion, but you are known to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006290_VRITRA(-帳の奥から響く声-)バルデシオン委員会の協力者を名乗ったようだが、
君たちが「暁の血盟」だろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006300_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)Even here have we heard of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006300_VRITRA<tab>(-帳の奥から響く声-)その噂は、私の国にも届いているぞ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006310_VRITRA<tab>I am Vrtra, and for years uncounted hath this isle served as mine abode.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006310_VRITRA私は、ヴリトラ。
いにしえよりこの島に棲む者だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006320_URIANGER<tab>Vrtra! Of the first brood, sibling to Hraesvelgr and Nidhogg!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006320_URIANGERヴリトラ……！
フレースヴェルグやニーズヘッグと同じ、七大天竜の……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006330_VRITRA<tab>Aye, mine elder brothers. Of Midgardsormr's spawn, I was last to hatch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006330_VRITRAああ、ミドガルズオルムの仔が一翼だ。
孵るのが最も遅かった私にとって、彼らは兄にあたる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006340_THANCRED<tab>Well, isn't this a surprise! We were told Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han had an alliance with a dragon, not that a great wyrm sat in the satrap's own hall...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006340_THANCREDこいつは驚きだ……！
ラザハン太守は竜を味方につけているという話だったが、
まさかこんな大物だったとはな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006350_AWAHEEN<tab>A necessary subterfuge, as the true tale of our nation's history illustrates most effectively.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006350_AWAHEENそれはあくまで市井の噂。
よければ私から、この国の真の歴史をお話しさせてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006360_AWAHEEN<tab>In the beginning, the rock upon which our city is built was home to Vrtra, and Vrtra alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006360_AWAHEEN遠い昔……ラザハンが建つこの大岩には、
ヴリトラ様がひとりでお住まいでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006370_AWAHEEN<tab>In time, the ancestors of the Matanga came to the island and established a foothold, but never did they dare disturb the wyrm's lair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006370_AWAHEEN島にマタンガ族の祖先がやってきて住み着きましたが、
彼らは偉大なる竜のねぐらを決して侵さなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006380_AWAHEEN<tab>Next to arrive were the Au Ra. Adopting the example of their Arkasodara allies, they too treated Vrtra with reverence and respect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006380_AWAHEEN次にやってきたアウラ族も、
盟友であるアルカソーダラ派のマタンガ族に倣い、
竜を敬いました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006390_AWAHEEN<tab>And for many years, an understanding between our forefathers and the great wyrm endured...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006390_AWAHEEN私たちの先祖は、そうして、
ヴリトラ様との緩やかな関係を築いていったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006400_AWAHEEN<tab>...Until marauding Hyurs from the mainland came, threatening to shatter our peace and tranquility.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006400_AWAHEEN変化が訪れたのは、
大陸からヒューラン族が攻め入ってきたときのこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006410_AWAHEEN<tab>When it seemed all would be drowned in blood, Vrtra himself came forth and quelled the rising conflict.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006410_AWAHEEN多くの血が流れんとしたとき、
ヴリトラ様が自ら進み出て、戦いを平定なさったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006420_AWAHEEN<tab>A peaceful accord was reached, and oaths sworn in Vrtra's name. Thus began the dragon's governance of the fledgling state which was to grow into Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006420_AWAHEEN和平のための取り決めがなされ、ヴリトラ様のもとに誓われた。
それが、竜の統べる国、ラザハンの原型です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006430_THANCRED<tab>But... If Vrtra is still here, then your position as satrap is just...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006430_THANCREDじゃあなんだ、今でもこの国の本当の太守は、
ヴリトラだっていうのか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006440_AWAHEEN<tab>...A “charade”? Yes, and one which my family has performed faithfully for generations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006440_AWAHEEN然り、私の一族は代々ヴリトラ様に仕え、
「表向きの太守」を務めて参りました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006450_VRITRA<tab>Many envy the great wyrms their power. Were it known that I ruled here, then the fires of war would burn without end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006450_VRITRA……竜の力は、大きい。
そして強大な力のあるところには、争いが絶えないものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006460_VRITRA<tab>I would not be the flame which consumeth my people. Those few who joined me in laying our country's foundations were, perforce, sworn to secrecy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006460_VRITRA私は皆を焼く炎になりたくなかった。
だから、国の礎を築いた者たちに、
真実を覆い隠すよう頼んだのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006470_ESTINIEN<tab>Your eye. It was taken?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006470_ESTINIEN<tab>お前、片眼はどうした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006480_VARSHAHN<tab>'Tis here. Buried within this semblance of flesh.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006480_VARSHAHNここだ。
今はこちらの身に埋め込んでいる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006490_VARSHAHN<tab>The body before thee is but a simulacrum, constructed by the finest artisans of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. With mine eye nestled within, it doth serve as an inconspicuous vessel for my will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006490_VARSHAHNこの身躯は、ラザハン工芸の粋を集めた人形なのだ。
そこに眼をはめることで、私の分身として使っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006500_ESTINIEN<tab>Ah. That would explain why I felt the presence of a dragon upon our first meeting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006500_ESTINIEN……なるほどな。
道理で最初に会ったときから竜の気配がしたわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006510_VARSHAHN<tab>I am woven with wards fashioned to deceive such arcane senses.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006510_VARSHAHNそれを誤魔化す術式が組み込まれているから、
普通は気づくものじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006520_VARSHAHN<tab>Though 'twas short-lived, it seemeth thy fusion with my brother hath left thee much altered, Estinien Wyrmblood.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006520_VARSHAHNやはり、いっときとはいえ、
兄さんと身を共にしていたからかな。
屠龍のエスティニアン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006530_VARSHAHN<tab>From the very first, we sensed the nature of one another. Yet did neither one of us bare his fangs.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006530_VARSHAHN……私たちはどちらも、最初から真実に気づいていた。
けれど互いに牙を剥かなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006540_VARSHAHN<tab>That is all I need know of thee for now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006540_VARSHAHN<tab>今は、それがすべてだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006550_VRITRA<tab>With my secret thus revealed, I have for you a proposal. Not as a wyrm of the first brood, but as the ruler of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006550_VRITRAさて、こちらの事情を明かしたところで、
君たちに取引を提案したい。
竜としてではなく、ラザハン太守としてだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006560_VRITRA<tab>With all haste must we take in hand the finished talismans and breach this foul spire. Thence, should it lay within our power, dispel its wicked influence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006560_VRITRA私たちは、完成した霊鱗を用いて、
早急に「ゾットの塔」を調査……可能ならば制圧したい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006570_VRITRA<tab>Yet even with the assurance of the warding scales, the narrow confines of the tower doth limit the size of our force.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006570_VRITRAだが、霊鱗の効果が万全だとしても、
尖塔である以上は、突入できる兵の数に限りがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006580_URIANGER<tab>And thus denied strength in numbers, thou must choose thy soldiers with care.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006580_URIANGER<tab>……数を絞る分、手練れを送り込みたいということでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006590_VRITRA<tab>Just so. Yet though our Radiant Host is formidable, I see a surer path before me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006590_VRITRAああ、まさにそのとおりだ。
我が国の誇る星戦士団も強者ぞろいだが、
今は少しでも可能性が高い道を選びたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006600_VRITRA<tab>Thou and thy comrades have contended with a multitude of primal beings. Most recently thou didst cast down false gods in Paglth'an and Carteneau, I am told.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006600_VRITRA君たちが、数々の蛮神と渡り合ってきたことは知っている。
先日も、パガルザンやカルテノー平原で、
偽りの神を退けたそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006610_VRITRA<tab>'Tis upon that strength I would call. The Scions have proven themselves most capable, and I ask that you serve as the tip of our spear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006610_VRITRAその力を、そしてヴァルシャンとして見た君たちを信じ、
「ゾットの塔」調査の先陣を切ってもらいたいのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006620_VRITRA<tab>Talismans would, of course, be provided for each of thy companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006620_VRITRA<tab>無論、君の仲間たちの分の霊鱗は用意しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006630_VRITRA<tab>And should you agree to this undertaking, more will be provided to make use of as you see fit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006630_VRITRA加えて、もしも引き受けてくれるのであれば、
より多くの霊鱗を提供するつもりだ。
使い方も、君たちに任せよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006640_THANCRED<tab>There's no denying it's a dangerous proposition, but the rewards may far outweigh the risk. Just think of what we might accomplish if we could equip all our allies with warding scales.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006640_THANCRED危険はあるが、悪い話じゃないな。
各国に霊鱗を渡すことができれば、ラザハンだけじゃなく、
世界中の脅威を掃うための足掛かりになるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006650_THANCRED<tab>I worry, however, that even the four of us may be too few for what you have in mind. Might we regroup with our friends first to discuss the matter?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006650_THANCREDだが、さすがに俺たち4人だけじゃ厳しいものがある。
一旦戻って、ほかの仲間と相談してきてもいいか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006660_VRITRA<tab>'Tis no trifling task that I have laid before you. Go, steel your hearts and hone your plans─such time as you require shall we spend in crafting your protective charms.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006660_VRITRAもちろん構わない。
易い依頼ではないのだ、こちらも待てるだけ待とう。
霊鱗を量産する時間も必要だからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006670_THANCRED<tab>It seems a quick trip back to Sharlayan is in order...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006670_THANCRED<tab>そういうことなら、一旦オールド・シャーレアンに戻って……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006680_VRITRA<tab>Wilt thou not lend thine aid?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006680_VRITRA<tab>……協力は、頼めないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006690_ESTINIEN<tab>Whether your request be made as a great wyrm or the ruler of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, I see no reason to refuse. Nor will I.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006690_ESTINIENお前は竜の言葉じゃなく、人の言葉で語っただろう。
「ラザハン太守からの」ウマい依頼を、俺が拒む理由はない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006700_VRITRA<tab>I am in thy debt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006700_VRITRA<tab>恩に着る……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006710_KRILE<tab>Your time in Thavnair has certainly been eventful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006710_KRILE<tab>サベネア島では、そんなことがあったのね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006720_KRILE<tab>In my opinion, carrying out Vrtra's request and assaulting the Tower of Zot should be our highest priority.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006720_KRILEとすると、ヴリトラさんの要請を受けて、
「ゾットの塔」の調査に行くのが最優先かしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006730_YSHTOLA<tab>I agree. While I still have questions concerning the Forum and their grand undertaking, we have all but exhausted our avenues of investigation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006730_YSHTOLAそうなるでしょうね。
哲学者議会の動きについて、まだ知りたいことはあるものの、
現状で思い当たる範囲は調べつくしている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006740_YSHTOLA<tab>Simply pressing them any harder on the subject will almost certainly result in our expulsion. Therefore I suggest we explore the aetherial sea connection by way of a letter to Master Matoya, then make our way to Thavnair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006740_YSHTOLA強引に踏み込もうとすれば、今度こそ退去になりかねないわ。
星海絡みの案件としてマトーヤに報告だけして、
サベネア島に向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006750_ALPHINAUD<tab>I wonder... Even with the protection these talismans afford us, what can we hope to achieve once inside the tower?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006750_ALPHINAUDしかし……「護魂の霊鱗」によって塔に入れたとして、
調査をする手立てはあるのだろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006760_ALPHINAUD<tab>According to Arenvald and Fordola's report, they were unable to free the Amalj'aa. Worse, their attempts triggered the tower's defenses, which led to a summoning of Lunar Ifrit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006760_ALPHINAUDアレンヴァルドとフォルドラが持ち帰ってくれた報告では、
囚われていたアマルジャ族の救助はできず、
防衛機構によってルナイフリートが強制召喚された……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006770_YSHTOLA<tab>What does it tell us that the spires even have such defenses?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006770_YSHTOLA<tab>まさにその、防衛機構が敷かれているというのが鍵ではなくて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006780_YSHTOLA<tab>Simply pulling a prisoner from the wall is fatal, thus the direct approach is doomed to failure from the outset. Any further measures to dissuade such actions seem...unnecessary.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006780_YSHTOLA囚われている者を装置から離そうとすると絶命する……
だとしたら、どのみち私たちは手出しできない。
彼らの奪還を阻止するのに、本来、防衛機構は必要ないのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006790_YSHTOLA<tab>Unless, of course, there <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> a way to free the prisoners without killing them. Then it stands to reason that any intruders would be met with overwhelming force.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006790_YSHTOLA逆に言えば、
死なせずとも装置と分離させる方法があるのだとしたら、
何としてでも侵入者を排除しなければならないでしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006800_URIANGER<tab>The towers appeared throughout the world in but the twinkling of an eye. 'Twas by magical means these structures were raised, I surmise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006800_URIANGER……あの塔は、突如として世界各地に出現した。
つまり、魔法を用いた構造物とみて間違いないでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006810_URIANGER<tab>A spire thus conjured must needs be maintained, and I suspect an arcane catalyst─some manner of “core”─doth lie hidden within.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006810_URIANGERであれば、存在を維持するための触媒や術式……
「核」と呼べるものが、塔のどこかにあるやもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006820_URIANGER<tab>Destroy the core, and the tower ceaseth to be...thus liberating the captives without harm!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006820_URIANGERそれを破壊することができれば、塔は消滅し、
囚われていた人々も解放される……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006830_YSHTOLA<tab>So we can hope. And I would prefer to enter the tower with a working theory than with no plan at all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006830_YSHTOLAそのとおり。
確証はないけれど、あてもなく塔に入るよりは、
よさそうでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006840_THANCRED<tab>Assuming Y'shtola's reasoning is correct, the chances of the defenses remaining dormant are small to none.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006840_THANCREDヤ・シュトラの読みが正しいとして、
防衛機構の作動そのものを避けることは難しそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006850_THANCRED<tab>Any primals will have to be dealt with, and defeating one will likely only lead to the summoning of another. Our every victory will only compound the prisoners' suffering.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006850_THANCRED蛮神が召喚されたら、倒すしかない。
するとまた次の蛮神が強制召喚される……。
囚われている連中への負担は、相当なものなんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006860_GRAHATIA<tab>May we not then divide our forces?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006860_GRAHATIA<tab>だとしたら、二手に分かれるのはどうだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006870_GRAHATIA<tab>Those proficient in healing will focus on sustaining the captives. That duty can be covered by Urianger, Krile, Y'shtola, and myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006870_GRAHATIAオレとウリエンジェとクルル、
それからヤ・シュトラも治癒魔法の心得があるよな。
この4人で、召喚に使役された奴らを癒すんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006880_GRAHATIA<tab>The remaining Scions will proceed with the search for the core. Admittedly, this strategy puts both parties at greater risk, but it should bolster our chances of saving the Arkasodara by a considerable margin.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006880_GRAHATIAその間に、残りのメンバーで核の捜索を進めてもらう。
戦力を分けるぶん戦いは厳しくなるが、
アルカソーダラたちの命を護れる可能性は上がるはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you sure Alphinaud is in the right group?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>アルフィノはこっちでいいのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What of Alisaie? She knows a healing spell or two.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>アリゼーも治癒魔法を使えるのでは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aren't you forgetting someone!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分も癒し手ですが！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006890_GRAHATIA<tab>If you're to fight primals, then you'd best have at least one healer with you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006890_GRAHATIAああ、喚び出された蛮神と戦うのにも、
癒し手は必要だろうからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006900_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I am more than happy to fulfill that role. I've found wielding a sage's armaments to be rather intuitive, and look forward to testing them against a more challenging foe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006900_ALPHINAUDそういうことなら、責任をもって捜索隊に加わらせてもらおう。
幸い、この賢具はとても馴染むんだ。
実戦で役に立てないということはないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006910_GRAHATIA<tab>That she does, but I think Alisaie herself would assert that she's at her best when she's charging unto the breach.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006910_GRAHATIAああ、でも攻め込む方を主体にしてこそ、
アリゼーの実力は活きるからな。
