source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006920_GRAHATIA<tab>And from what I recall from the Grand Cosmos, there's a spring in her step when she fights by your side.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006920_GRAHATIAそれに、あんたと一緒の方が動きがいいって、
グラン・コスモスに行くときに言われてただろ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006930_ALISAIE<tab>Ye gods, will you never let me hear the end of that? Rest assured that I will do what is asked of me regardless of who I happen to be standing next to at any given time!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006930_ALISAIEどんな相乗効果よ、っていうか忘れなさいよ！
何にせよちゃんと任された役目を果たしますからご心配なく！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006940_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course not! As our most talented healer, we need you leading the van, fighting primals on the front lines.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006940_GRAHATIAもちろんわかってるって！
いちばんの癒し手だからこそ、あんたには、
蛮神と戦う捜索隊の方を任されてほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006950_KRILE<tab>It seems we have a plan; all that remains is to carry it out. I will inform Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han of our movements, so let us make our preparations and regroup near the tower.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006950_KRILEそれじゃあ、あとは決行あるのみね。
ラザハンには先行して連絡を入れておくから、
戦いの準備をして現地に集合しましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006960_THANCRED<tab>The military post in what's left of the Hamsa Hatchery should serve as a convenient staging point.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006960_THANCREDハンサ牧場跡にある、星戦士団の拠点なら、
塔の状態がよく見えたはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006970_KRILE<tab>That sounds perfect! And remember: the experimental aetheryte at the Confluence is there for those who need it, so there's no excuse for being late!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006970_KRILEなら、そこで決まり！
必要な人は、転送魔法研究所で新型エーテライトを借りてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006980_KRILE<tab>Is everyone all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006980_KRILE<tab>みんな、無事！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006990_GRAHATIA<tab>We fortified the captives with what magicks we could. Have the defenses been disabled? All appears quiet for the moment...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006990_GRAHATIA囚われてた奴らには、使えるだけ治癒魔法をかけてきた……！
防衛機構が一旦止まったから、合流しに来たんだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007000_KRILE<tab>The lower floors were disturbing enough, but this place feels...wrong. The aether is heavy and thick. Like wading through a quagmire...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007000_KRILE下の階も相当だったけど、ここもすごく嫌な感じ……。
濃いエーテルが渦巻いている気がするわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007010_URIANGER<tab>I believe we stand in the tower's beating heart. What sayest thou, Y'shtola...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007010_URIANGER同感です、恐らくここが塔の心臓部かと。
だとすれば……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007020_YSHTOLA<tab>I see it. Aether siphoned from the land runs up through the spire, flowing to a single point...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007020_YSHTOLA視えるわ……。
地脈から吸い上げられたエーテルが、塔の中を奔って、
一点に流れ込んでいる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007030_YSHTOLA<tab>This is the core we seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007030_YSHTOLA<tab>この装置が核とみて間違いないはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007040_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet something is...off. As large as this structure is, it siphons far more aether than is required to sustain it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007040_YSHTOLAでも変ね……ゾットの塔はかなりの規模だけれど、
そうだとしても、吸い上げているエーテルの量が多すぎる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007050_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis as if the core is feeding on the energy. Consuming it. I need to take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007050_YSHTOLAまるで、核そのものが、エーテルを喰らっているかのようだわ。
もう少し深くまで視てみないと……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007060_YSHTOLA<tab>...Curious. There is something there, embedded inside the core.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007060_YSHTOLA……これは、何？
何かが、奥に埋め込まれてる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007070_YSHTOLA<tab>A man's limb...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007070_YSHTOLA<tab>まるで……人の足を…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007080_ESTINIEN<tab>This is what we came to destroy?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007080_ESTINIEN<tab>おい、それを壊せばいいのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007090_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes. If you would be so kind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007090_YSHTOLA<tab>え、ええ……お願いしてもいいかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007110_ALPHINAUD<tab>And that should be the end of it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007110_ALPHINAUD<tab>よし、これできっと皆を……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007120_ALISAIE<tab>Ugh, what now!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007120_ALISAIE<tab>ちょっと、何事！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007130_URIANGER<tab>My theory that the tower might come crashing down following the core's destruction doth appear to be correct.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007130_URIANGERこの塔そのものが魔法であるならば、
核の崩壊とともに消え去るは必定……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007140_ALISAIE<tab>Bully for you! And how are we supposed to survive the fall!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007140_ALISAIEはぁ！？
下の階で捕まってる人たち、どうするのよ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007150_GRAHATIA<tab>What of the prisoners below...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007150_GRAHATIA<tab>クソ、こうなったら……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007160_YSHTOLA<tab>The floor beneath our very feet dissolves. Brace yourselves!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007160_YSHTOLAエーテルが急速に霧散してる。
落ちるわ、備えて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007170_GRAHATIA<tab>I pray I'm not too late!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007170_GRAHATIA<tab>届け！　レビテト……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007180_ALISAIE<tab>What happened? Where are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007180_ALISAIE<tab>ここは……何が起きたの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007190_ALPHINAUD<tab>By my reckoning, we're still on the island where the tower stood but...'tis as if it never existed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007190_ALPHINAUD位置からして、ゾットの塔があった島で間違いないようだね。
塔自体は、綺麗になくなっているようだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hardly a scratch. But how...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007200_ALPHINAUD怪我らしい怪我はない。
これは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007210_KRILE<tab>G'raha wove a levitation spell at the last moment. Large enough to catch everyone, it would seem.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007210_KRILEラハくんが、すんでのところで浮遊魔法をかけてくれたみたい。
それも、とびきり広い範囲にね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007220_THANCRED<tab>That explains the lack of obvious injuries.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007220_THANCRED<tab>道理でこいつらにも外傷がないわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007230_KRILE<tab>The expenditure of so much aether has taken its toll. He will need plenty of rest, but should otherwise be none the worse for wear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007230_KRILEそれで魔力を使い果たしたみたいで、目を回しちゃってるの。
しばらく休ませないといけないけど、命に別状はないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007240_THANCRED<tab>Then the immediate problem is what to do with our new friends here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007240_THANCRED<tab>となると、問題は囚われてた奴らをどうするかだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007250_THANCRED<tab>They'll be much changed for their time in the tower. Even if their bodies are intact, I doubt we could say the same for their minds.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007250_THANCREDどうにか身体は護れたが、
塔の中でエーテル放射を浴び続けていたんだ。
心の方まで無事とはいかないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007260_ALISAIE<tab>Angelo and I will take care of that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007260_ALISAIE<tab>私がアンジェロで治療してみる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007270_THANCRED<tab>I have every faith in you, Alisaie, but there are just too many for you to treat alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007270_THANCRED是非と言いたいところだが、この人数だ。
アリゼーひとりじゃ厳しいだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007280_YSHTOLA<tab>We'll send at once to Eorzea for more porxies, and call on the local mages to lend a hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007280_YSHTOLAエオルゼアから治療用のポークシーを取り寄せて、
ラザハンの魔術師たちの力を借りましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007290_VARSHAHN<tab>Hail, Scions!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007290_VARSHAHN<tab>みなさん……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007300_VARSHAHN<tab>We were watching the tower, when it simply...disappeared. What happened here?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007300_VARSHAHN塔が消えたのを見ました。
これは、いったい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007310_URIANGER<tab>The threat is banished, and thy people delivered. They are, however, in need of treatment, and we of a secure locale and helping hands to assist us in its provision.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007310_URIANGER脅威は去り、囚われていた皆様も解放されました。
されど、治療のための場所と人手が必要です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007320_VARSHAHN<tab>You shall have all this and more. Come, let us convey these unfortunate souls to the city.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007320_VARSHAHN承知しました、今すぐに手配を。
まずは彼らをラザハンへ運びましょう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007330_THANCRED<tab>...Are we the last to arrive? I hope we've not kept you waiting!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007330_THANCREDなんだ、俺たちが最後か。
待たせて悪かった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007340_AWAHEEN<tab>Not at all. Your comrade is feeling better, I trust?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007340_AWAHEEN<tab>お仲間のご体調は、もうよろしいのですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007350_GRAHATIA<tab>Much better, thank you. Hannish remedies are certainly potent─in more ways than one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007350_GRAHATIAああ、おかげさまで。
本場ラザハンの錬金薬はすごいな……いろいろと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007360_AWAHEEN<tab>One becomes accustomed to the taste, although I hope you never have cause to do so. Pray take your ease.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007360_AWAHEEN慣れれば悪くないですよ。
もっとも、慣れない方がより良いとは思いますがね。
どうか、楽になさっていてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007370_GRAHATIA<tab>Full glad I am to see you all unharmed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007370_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたたちが、みんな無事でよかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007380_VRITRA<tab>Valiant Scions. For your heroism, you have my boundless gratitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007380_VRITRAでは、改めて……
此度の件について、君たちに感謝を伝えたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007390_VRITRA<tab>You cast down that dire tower and set free its hapless captives. You cleansed their souls of its corrupting influence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007390_VRITRA塔を消滅させるために奮戦してくれたこと……
囚われていた者たちを救い出し、
精神汚染を取り除く手筈まで整えてくれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007400_VRITRA<tab>No words of thanks will suffice. In place of platitudes, I offer a bounty of warding scales.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007400_VRITRA本当に、ありがとう。
到底及ばぬ言葉に代えて、できるかぎり多く、
「護魂の霊鱗」を用意させてもらった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007410_VRITRA<tab>Pray accept your due reward, along with the good will of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007410_VRITRA<tab>どうか、ラザハンからの謝意と思って、受け取ってほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007420_AWAHEEN<tab>Alchemists throughout the land were put to work in the forging of your talismans. The finished ones have been collected, and now await you at the High Crucible of Al-Kimiya.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007420_AWAHEEN国中の錬金術師が総力を挙げて作った霊鱗は、
都市内にある「アルキミヤ製薬堂」に集められています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007430_AWAHEEN<tab>Present this letter when you are ready to take them into your possession.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007430_AWAHEEN<tab>手形をお渡ししますので、お帰りの前にお立ち寄りください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007440_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are humbled by your generosity. Know that the inventive wisdom of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han will be vital in restoring serenity to our star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007440_ALPHINAUDこちらこそ、感謝いたします。
偉大なるラザハンの叡智を、必ずや、
世界に平穏をもたらすために使いましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007450_ALISAIE<tab>Every single one of those scales came from you, didn't they? You must still be in such pain...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007450_ALISAIEでも……それって、もとはあなたの鱗なんでしょう？
痛い思いをさせて、ごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007460_VRITRA<tab>'Tis of no moment. A mere annoyance compared to the dreadful suffering inflicted upon this land and its people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007460_VRITRA構わないとも。
この土地や民が傷つけられる痛みに比べれば、
まったく取るに足らないものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007470_ALPHINAUD<tab>Albeit brief, my involvement in the Dragonsong War afforded me a glimpse of the myriad sorrows which consumed both dragon and man.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007470_ALPHINAUD……竜詩戦争に関わる中で、
竜と人のさまざまな想いを垣間見ました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though you were half a world away, such tragedies as befell your kin must have affected you deeply.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007480_ALPHINAUD住む土地は違えど、七大天竜であるあなたにとって、
己が苦しみのように思える悲劇も少なくなかったでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007490_ALPHINAUD<tab>And yet you chose to live among men.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007490_ALPHINAUD<tab>それでも、人とともにいてくださるのですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007500_VRITRA<tab>In the age when that conflict first bloomed, my choice had already been made.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007500_VRITRAあの戦いが始まったころ、
私はすでに、ラザハンの民とともにあった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007510_VRITRA<tab>In some distant place, man slew dragon, and dragon slaughtered man. Yet no hate could I muster for those smiling faces which did look to me for guidance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007510_VRITRAどこかでヒトが竜を殺め、竜がヒトを切り裂いていたとして、
目の前で微笑む者をどうして憎めよう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007520_VRITRA<tab>Not even my brother's righteous rage could rally me to his cause. I huddled here, secret and still, hoping against hope that which I had built would remain untouched by the chaos and carnage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007520_VRITRA私は結局、兄さんの怒りにさえ応えられなかった。
ここで息をひそめ、ただ、
築いてきたものが壊れないようにと願っていたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007530_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould seem we share the same desire for peace, great Vrtra. To that end, I wonder if we might trouble you with another question.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007530_YSHTOLA太守様、あなたが平和を望んでくれているなら、
もうひとつだけ、聞かせてもらってもいいかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007540_YSHTOLA<tab>The Telophoroi are intent on recreating the Final Days, an apocalyptic event which we know to predate the sundering of the star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007540_YSHTOLAテロフォロイは、終末を引き起こすと宣言した……。
その災厄は、かつてこの星が14の世界に分かたれる前にも、
起こっていたものなのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007550_YSHTOLA<tab>As the longest lived among us, know you aught of this terrible cataclysm?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007550_YSHTOLA<tab>長きを生きる竜として、何か知っていることはないかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007560_VRITRA<tab>Nay. When war and strife drove my sire from his home, he crossed the great expanse with only our unhatched eggs as company.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007560_VRITRA残念ながら。
父祖ミドガルズオルムは、故郷の星を戦乱で追われ、
私たちの卵だけを携えて星を渡ってきたそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007570_VRITRA<tab>He alighted upon a shattered Source, its thirteen reflections long since scattered beyond the rift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007570_VRITRAそしてこの地に到着したとき、
すでに世界は分かたれていたと聞く。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007580_VRITRA<tab>Of events preceding his arrival, he knoweth naught save that which Hydaelyn hath deigned to disclose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007580_VRITRAそれ以前のことであれば、父とて、
ハイデリンから告げられないかぎりは知る由もないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007590_YSHTOLA<tab>I see... So again, 'tis the inscrutable Hydaelyn to whom we must look for answers.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007590_YSHTOLAそうなのね……。
だとすると、やはりハイデリンの考え次第か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007600_VRITRA<tab>Seek you to divine the will of this star? If so, I have a tale which may afford you some small comfort.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007600_VRITRA君たちは、星の意思を測りたいのか？
だとすれば、ひとつ、話せることがあるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007610_VRITRA<tab>'Tis a story from my youth, many, many years ago... To my sire, I once posed the question, “Of all the stars in the sky, why didst thou settle upon this one?”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007610_VRITRA私がまだ幼かった、遠い昔のことではあるが……
一度だけ「なぜこの星を選んだのか」と、
父に問うたことがあったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007620_VRITRA<tab>To which Midgardsormr did reply, “'Twas the last bastion of hope.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007620_VRITRA父は言った。
ここが「最後に残った希望」であったのだ、と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007630_VRITRA<tab>He believed, so long as Hydaelyn endured, so too might dragonkind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007630_VRITRAハイデリンが屈さぬかぎり、
ここでなら竜の未来も拓けるやも知れぬ……
そう考えたのだと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007640_VRITRA<tab>Solemn and portentous were his words. What deeper meaning they held, I could not─dared not─pursue. 'Tis a stone I've left unturned ever since.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007640_VRITRA父の言葉は重々しく、切実だった。
私は真意を追求することもできず……それきりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007650_VRITRA<tab>Yet take you solace in the knowledge that, whatsoever Hydaelyn doth strive towards, 'tis an ideal which hath earned my sire's conviction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007650_VRITRAただ、少なくともハイデリンには、
父が信じるだけの思惑があるのだと私は考えている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007660_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you, Vrtra. You've given us warm reassurance in a world gripped by cold uncertainty.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007660_YSHTOLA貴重な話をありがとう。
この戦いの終わりまで、きっと覚えておくわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007670_THANCRED<tab>While I'm sure we all have a great many questions, I think it's time we collect the talismans and be on our way. Our fight against the Telophoroi is far from finished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007670_THANCRED聞きたいことも聞けたなら、
そろそろ、霊鱗を受け取りに行くとしよう。
ほかの場所では、まだ戦いが続いてるわけだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007680_KRILE<tab>We must take our leave, but please do inform us if we can provide any further assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007680_KRILEそれじゃあ、私たちは失礼します。
また何かあれば、すぐにご連絡くださいね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007690_VRITRA<tab>Prithee, a moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007690_VRITRA<tab>ああ、君、待ってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007700_VRITRA<tab>There is one whom my sire hath judged worthy of honor and respect─the one known to men as Eorzea's champion. This hero of renown and rumor...'tis thee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007700_VRITRA父が、とあるヒトを認めたと伝え聞いた。
それが、英雄と呼ばれる者であるとも。
……君のことだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Midgardsormr and I have crossed paths, yes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>確かに、ミドガルズオルムの力を借りた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've not spoken with your father in some time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>最近は話もできていないが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I only wish he could be here with us now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>もう、当分会えそうもないが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007710_VRITRA<tab>I knew it to be so. From man and dragon alike have I learned of thine exploits.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007710_VRITRAやはりそうか。
ヒトの輪と、竜の輪のそれぞれから、
噂は聞いていたものでな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007720_VRITRA<tab>In accordance with the covenant he forged with Hydaelyn, the stewardship of this star hath ever been his purpose. Silence in the face of thine actions is the greatest sign of his approval.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007720_VRITRA父は、ハイデリンと契約したそのときから、
星の守護者となった。
それが黙しているということこそ、何よりの信頼の証だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007730_VRITRA<tab>I know of his clash with Omega, and the long slumber which was his price.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007730_VRITRAああ、オメガと対峙し、しばしの眠りについたそうだな。
だが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007740_VRITRA<tab>Yet even closed in sleep, my father's eyes are far from blind. He is watching over thee; watching over this world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007740_VRITRA父の眼は、まさに彼方まで見通す真眼だ。
眠りのうちにあっても、君と世界を見守っているだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007750_VRITRA<tab>'Twas a revelation most pleasing that thou─a child of man─had gained Midgardsormr's trust. But alongside mine elation runneth a rivulet of dread.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007750_VRITRA……私は、父と盟約を結んだヒトがいるという事実を、
好ましく思う。
けれど同時に、案じずにはいられないのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007760_VRITRA<tab>For upon thy life's reel wind too many threads. Of fate. Power. Weal, enmeshed with woe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007760_VRITRA君は私が知りうるかぎりでも、
運命と力を、引き寄せすぎている。
良きものも、悪しきものもだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007770_VRITRA<tab>Amidst this tangled knot, thou shalt know no rest. 'Tis an endless confluence of forces; a struggle without surcease.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007770_VRITRAそれらは君を安寧の内に留まらせてはくれない。
困難な試練となって、次々と襲い来るだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007780_VRITRA<tab>More terrible still is the attrition wrought upon thy companions, as they are swept up in the storm of thine existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007780_VRITRAしかしもっとも恐ろしいのは、
君を中心に渦巻く熱が、君のそばにいる者を、
燃やし尽くしてしまうことなのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007790_VRITRA<tab>Take heart and protect them well. They will be your strength and your salvation. The hope thou wilt need come the end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007790_VRITRA……進むのなら、護り抜け。
それこそがいつか必ず、君自身の力となり、希望になる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007800_VRITRA<tab>Even cowering behind my curtain, I know the suffering of the powerful. I have watched my siblings driven mad by loss.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007800_VRITRA臆してばかりの私が言うことではないかもしれないが、
兄さんや姉さん、血族の竜たち……
力ある者の苦しみを、数えきれないほど見てきたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007810_VRITRA<tab>Thus do I exhort thee to spare no effort to keep thy loved ones safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007810_VRITRA<tab>だから、やはり……君にはそれを諦めないでいてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, apologies. We hadn't meant to interrupt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007820_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ、すまない、まだ話の途中だっただろうか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007830_ALISAIE<tab>It's just that we <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> have a history of suddenly collapsing, and when you didn't follow us out...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007830_ALISAIEあなただけ出てこないから、
何かあったのかなって思ったんだけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007840_VRITRA<tab>'Tis I who must apologize. I have detained your champion overlong with idle chatter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007840_VRITRAこちらこそ申し訳がない。
ただの雑談だ、君たちの英雄はすぐに解放しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007850_VRITRA<tab>Go. At war's end, I pray I welcome thee back into my hall, where together with thy joyful comrades you may toast your triumph.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007850_VRITRA戦いの先に、君と、
君が護った者の笑顔があることを願っているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007860_ALISAIE<tab>These are the talismans we were promised?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007860_ALISAIE<tab>「護魂の霊鱗」は受け取れた？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007870_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes, and I made a quick count: there are far more than we could have hoped for.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007870_YSHTOLAええ、待っている間に確認させてもらったけれど、
想像以上の数だったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007880_YSHTOLA<tab>Enough to outfit an entire company of soldiers, in fact. Considering the involved process, that they were able to manufacture so many in such a short span of time is nothing short of a miracle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007880_YSHTOLA中隊規模の人数になら、行き渡るんじゃないかしら。
あれほど緻密な魔具を、短時間でよくもここまで……
さすがラザハンといったところね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once we have distributed them to our allies in Eorzea and the Far East, we'll have a fighting chance to bring down the other spires─just as we did with the Tower of Zot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007890_ALPHINAUDそれをエオルゼアや東方の諸国に届ければ、
私たちが「ゾットの塔」でやったように、
各地の塔を消滅させられるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007900_YSHTOLA<tab>Or, we could use them to invade Garlemald proper, and strike directly at the Telophoroi's base of operations...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007900_YSHTOLAあるいは、テロフォロイが根城にしているであろう、
ガレマール帝国本土に乗りこむことも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007910_YSHTOLA<tab>Of course, we would need to consult with various Alliance leaders before such a drastic measure could even be contemplated.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007910_YSHTOLA何にせよ、グランドカンパニー・エオルゼアや、
東方連合の意向を聞いてみないことには始まらないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007920_YSHTOLA<tab>To which end I could set out forthwith and present the idea to each of our allies in person.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007920_YSHTOLAということで、私はこのまま各地をまわって、
話をしてこようと思うのだけれど……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007930_URIANGER<tab>Pray allow me to undertake some few of those journeys. I find myself restless, and in need of purposeful duties.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007930_URIANGERでしたら、私もいくつかの地域を受け持ちましょう。
幸い、まだ余力がございますので……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007940_THANCRED<tab>I can head eastward. Bozja and Dalmasca are just a short hop from here, and Doma's shinobi network should come in handy for passing on the word.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007940_THANCRED東方は俺が行く。
ここからだったらボズヤやダルマスカに出やすいし、
ドマの忍びとの連絡網も、まだ使えるはずだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007950_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall share the burden, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007950_YSHTOLA<tab>いいわ、決まりね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007960_YSHTOLA<tab>Meanwhile, I think it best that you and the others take the talismans back to the Baldesion Annex. We must keep them safe and secure until we've decided upon a course of action.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007960_YSHTOLAあなたたちは、霊鱗を持って、
バルデシオン分館に戻っていてもらえるかしら？
結論が出るまでは、安全に保管しておく必要があるもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007970_NIDHANA<tab>Please, I must speak with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007970_NIDHANA<tab>(-？？？？-)待って、少しだけ話を……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007980_THANCRED<tab>Nidhana!? You're awake!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007980_THANCRED<tab>ニッダーナ、お前、意識が戻ったのか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007990_NIDHANA<tab>Yes. When I spoke with the carer at my bedside, she told me that one of the Scions─a young woman─had cleansed me of the tower's corruption.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007990_NIDHANAうん、看てくれてた人に聞いたら、
「暁」の女の子が、精神汚染を治してくれたんだって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008000_NIDHANA<tab>It seems I've been asleep ever since the treatment... But when I awoke and learned you were all still here, I knew I had to come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008000_NIDHANA治してもらったあとも、しばらく眠っていたんだけど……
今さっき目が覚めて、みんながまだいるかもって聞いたから、
飛び出してきたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008010_ALISAIE<tab>As you said, Nidhana was captured only recently.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008010_ALISAIEあなたの話だと、彼女が塔に取り込まれたのは、
つい最近だったでしょ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008020_ALISAIE<tab>Such a brief exposure is swiftly cured, so I tended to her before we gathered at Meghaduta.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008020_ALISAIEそれなら治しきれるんじゃないかと思って、
メーガドゥータ宮に集合する前に、ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008030_NIDHANA<tab>And I am truly grateful that you did! I cannot thank you enough...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008030_NIDHANAああ！　キミだったんだね……！
どうしよう、何とお礼を言ったらいいか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008040_NIDHANA<tab>All of you─for everything you've done. Destroying the tower, rescuing our people...you've saved Thavnair from an awful fate!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008040_NIDHANAそれに、みんなにも……
あの塔を消してくれて、仲間を助け出してくれて、
サベネア島を救ってくれて……本当に、ありがとう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008050_URIANGER<tab>Yet who hath truly saved whom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008050_URIANGER<tab>さて……救われたのは、果たしてどちらでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008060_URIANGER<tab>Due in no small part to thine inspirational courage, the alchemists were successful in reproducing warding scales of proven efficacy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008060_URIANGER錬金術師たちの熱意と奮励、
そして、あなたの勇気によって完成した「護魂の霊鱗」……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008070_URIANGER<tab>Replications of thy work now stand ready to travel across the seas, unto the hands of those who might wield them against this rising evil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008070_URIANGERそれが今、世界中に届けられ、
脅威に抗う者たちの力になろうとしているのですから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008080_NIDHANA<tab>The talisman? Is this true!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008080_NIDHANA<tab>うそ……本当に……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008090_NIDHANA<tab>I was so groggy from sleep, I didn't even think to ask.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008090_NIDHANAアタシ、起きたばっかりで、
肝心なこと……何も聞いてなくて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008100_NIDHANA<tab>Our great work, sent across the seas...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008100_NIDHANA<tab>そっか……この霊鱗が、世界のみんなを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008110_NIDHANA<tab>It was worth it. It was all worth it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008110_NIDHANA<tab>ありがとう……がんばって、よかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008120_KRILE<tab>Look at that! Its color is completely changed!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008120_KRILE綺麗……！
最初に見たときの色と、全然違うわ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008130_NIDHANA<tab>What do you have there...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008130_NIDHANA<tab>それは……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008140_NIDHANA<tab>How unusual. I wonder if the effect is a reaction to akasa.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008140_NIDHANA人の心を映す花……。
珍しいね、「アーカーシャ」に呼応してるのかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008150_KRILE<tab>I'm afraid I'm not familiar with that term.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008150_KRILE<tab>どういうことかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008160_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa? It is one of the unseen energies defined by Hannish alchemical theory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008160_NIDHANAああ、えっと……
アーカーシャは、ラザハン式の錬金術に存在する概念で、
目には見えない力のひとつよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008170_NIDHANA<tab>Though a gross oversimplification, some describe it as an essence influenced by feelings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008170_NIDHANA<tab>想いが動かす力、なんて言われてるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008180_ALPHINAUD<tab>You imply that it is distinct from aether?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008180_ALPHINAUD<tab>エーテルとは違うのかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008190_NIDHANA<tab>Foreign scholars often conflate the two, but we see them as separate concepts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008190_NIDHANAそうだね、外国の人には混同されやすいんだけど、
アタシたちは区別してる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008200_NIDHANA<tab>Aether is an energy which permeates the land. It exists within animals, objects, even the air we breathe, affecting all through which it flows.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008200_NIDHANAエーテルは、地に満ちる力。
あらゆる生物や物体、そこに触れる大気の中にさえあって、
状態を変えながら巡っていくもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008210_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa, on the other hand, exists in a domain beyond our reach. A gift bestowed from on high─or torn from the heavens, in some traditions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008210_NIDHANA対してアーカーシャは、
アタシたちの手が届かない領分にある力……
天より下りし力なの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008220_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa can neither be created, nor destroyed. It is beyond our power to purposefully alter or manipulate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008220_NIDHANAその在り方を、アタシたちの行いで変えることはできない。
増やすことも、消すことも、何ひとつとしてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008230_NIDHANA<tab>The only thing observed to influence it is an abundance of...I want to say “spiritual emotion.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008230_NIDHANAけれど唯一、想いによってのみ、
アーカーシャを動かすことができるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008240_NIDHANA<tab>As a veteran of the battlefield, surely you've experienced moments of desperation or exaltation when you've transcended the usual limits of your capabilities?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008240_NIDHANA歴戦の猛者であるキミなら、
窮地に陥ったときや、高揚が極まったときに、
限界を超えたことがあるんじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008250_NIDHANA<tab>That is a manifestation of akasa, the invisible essence harnessed by heart, mind, and unyielding spirit!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008250_NIDHANAあれこそ、強い意志によって、
キミの底力にアーカーシャが乗っかった状態ってこと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008260_YSHTOLA<tab>I really must hear more about this theory! Our disciplines are based entirely upon the idea that aether is the fundamental form of all energy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008260_YSHTOLAとても興味深いわ……！
エーテルを唯一の力の根源とする私たちの学問にはない考えよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008270_NIDHANA<tab>I'm glad my haphazard explanation has piqued your interest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008270_NIDHANA<tab>そう言ってもらえると、なんだか嬉しいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008280_NIDHANA<tab>But even for us, akasa is a somewhat abstract field of study. A lack of practical application lends itself poorly to formalized research.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008280_NIDHANAだけど、アーカーシャはアタシたちにとっても、
古典の概念にすぎないというか……
実用性がないから、研究らしい研究もされてないの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008290_NIDHANA<tab>Which is why my analysis of your flower can amount to little more than idle speculation. I am sorry...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008290_NIDHANAその花についても、「そうかな」って思ったくらいで、
詳しい説明はできそうにないや。
ごめんね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008300_KRILE<tab>Nonsense, you have nothing to be sorry for. Your insight is much appreciated!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008300_KRILE謝ることなんてないわ。
貴重な見解をありがとう、ニッダーナさん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Shall we depart for Sharlayan, then? I will see to it that the talismans arrive at the annex.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008310_ALPHINAUDでは、バルデシオン分館に帰ろうか。
霊鱗を運ぶ役目は任せてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008320_THANCRED<tab>And we will be in touch once our talks are concluded. I suggest you rest while you can─from here onward, sleep is bound to be in short supply.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008320_THANCREDこっちも、話がついたらすぐに連絡する。
それまでは、しっかり休んでおくんだぞ。
どう転ぶにせよ、道は険しいだろうからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008330_VRITRA<tab>Take heart and protect them well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008330_VRITRA<tab>進むのなら  護り抜け――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008340_ALISAIE<tab>Good, you're here! You haven't eaten yet, have you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008340_ALISAIEあ、いたいた！
ねえ、あなたも食事まだでしょ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008350_ALISAIE<tab>We've brought quite a spread if you're interested. Only the finest dining from the Last Stand!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008350_ALISAIEいろいろ買ってきたから、一緒に食べない？
味は保証するわ、ラストスタンドだもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008355_GRAHATIA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008355_GRAHATIA<tab>あむ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008356_GRAHATIA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008356_GRAHATIA<tab>んー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008357_ALISAIE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008357_ALISAIE<tab>にひ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008358_GRAHATIA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008358_GRAHATIA<tab>わわっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lest you wonder, we invited Estinien as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008360_ALPHINAUD<tab>ここに来る前に、エスティニアンのことも誘ったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008370_ALPHINAUD<tab>But he refused with a rather grim-faced “No, thank you.” I suspect Sharlayan cuisine is not to his liking...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008370_ALPHINAUDけれど、なんだかものすごく渋い顔をして「俺はいい」と……。
シャーレアンの料理は、口に合わなかったのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008380_KRILE<tab>Oh, I don't know about that. Perhaps our lone wolf just needed some time apart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008380_KRILEそうでもないと思うけれど。
ほら、疲れてるから独りになりたかったんじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008390_ALISAIE<tab>What, to perfect his brooding stare!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008390_ALISAIE<tab>格好つけてるだけよ、格好つけてるだけ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008400_ALISAIE<tab>Next time, I'll drag him out by the ear, sit him down in front of a Sharlayan feast, and see that he eats every last bite.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008400_ALISAIE次は絶対に連れ出して、
栄養の寄せ集めみたいなシャーレアン料理を、
山ほど食べさせてやるんだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008410_ALPHINAUD<tab>An excellent idea. Of all people, warriors must take proper meals and rest if they are to maintain a healthy constitution.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008410_ALPHINAUDそれはいい計画だ。
戦う者こそ、しっかり食事と休息をとって、
体調を整えておくべきだからね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008420_KRILE<tab>Poor Estinien, beset on all sides.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008420_KRILE<tab>大変ねぇ、エスティニアンさんも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008430_GRAHATIA<tab>Speaking of one's physical condition, Mistress Krile, I hear you recently played literal host to Hydaelyn Herself...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008430_GRAHATIA体調といえば、クルルは大丈夫なのか？
ラヴィリンソスでハイデリンに身体を貸したって聞いたが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008440_KRILE<tab>And what an experience that was. Tiring, yes, but no lasting harm done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008440_KRILEええ、まったく問題ないわ。
直後に疲れを感じてた程度。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008450_KRILE<tab>If anything, I should have liked to speak with Her longer... I've not felt a hint of Her presence since.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008450_KRILEむしろ、もっと彼女と話せたらいいんだけど……。
あれ以降は、ちっとも気配を掴めないの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008460_ALISAIE<tab>Hydaelyn instructed you to carry that flower, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008460_ALISAIE<tab>ハイデリンからは、あの花を持っていくよう言われたのよね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008470_ALISAIE<tab>'Twill be your guide─“test and proof of your conviction.” And then something about seeking joy in darkness, was it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008470_ALISAIEそれは道標であり、あなたを、人を試すもの。
暗闇のうちに、歓びを探せ……だっけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008480_ALISAIE<tab>Come to think of it... Isn't that what happened with Nidhana, back in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008480_ALISAIEどういう意味かしら。
ラザハンでニッダーナと話してたときの輝きに関係してる……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008490_ALPHINAUD<tab>The flower did seem to radiate a joyful glow. As if reflecting the elation we all felt. The relief of a people with renewed hope.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008490_ALPHINAUDあれはまさしく、歓びを映したかのようだったね。
彼女や、安息を得たラザハンの民たちの……
あるいは、そこに立ち会えた私たちの歓びだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008500_GRAHATIA<tab>Indeed. And in turn, I felt buoyed by that radiance. 'Twas akin to spotting a beacon, and knowing we were on the right path.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008500_GRAHATIAそうだな。
オレも少し元気をもらったというか、
次もまたがんばるかって、踏み出す気力が湧いた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008510_GRAHATIA<tab>I know we've not yet triumphed over the Telophoroi, or learned the full breadth of the Forum's plans...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008510_GRAHATIAまだテロフォロイの企みを完全に阻止できたわけじゃないし、
哲学者議会の思惑にも、謎は多い……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008520_GRAHATIA<tab>But even within the midst of our struggles, we find small moments of joy to sustain us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008520_GRAHATIAけど、ままならない状況の中にも、
小さな歓びが生まれることが確かにある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008530_GRAHATIA<tab>Rare and hard-won, perhaps. But it is this pursuit of happiness that gives us the strength to carry on, day after day...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008530_GRAHATIA人は存外、それで日々を戦っていけるものだ。
昔から……何度だって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008540_GRAHATIA<tab>Hey! That's mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008540_GRAHATIA<tab>ああっ、オレの分……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008550_ALISAIE<tab>To the swift, the spoils! Though I recall that levitation spell of yours was quick enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008550_ALISAIEいいじゃない。
それにしてもラハ、よく浮遊魔法なんて覚えてたわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008560_GRAHATIA<tab>Only barely. And even at my best, I'm still too slow to wield it effectively in battle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008560_GRAHATIA……まあな。
ただ、発動まで少し時間がかかるから、
戦いの中で咄嗟に使うのは厳しそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008570_GRAHATIA<tab>Mayhap I simply require more practice with this new magick...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008570_GRAHATIA<tab>覚えたてだから、単に慣れてないだけかもしれないが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008580_ALPHINAUD<tab>You unearthed it from the depths of Noumenon, I presume?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008580_ALPHINAUD<tab>もしかして、ヌーメノン大書院を探索したときに？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008590_GRAHATIA<tab>Aye, and from a veritable mountain of arcane tomes, at that. 'Twas...necessary to facilitate my solitary explorations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008590_GRAHATIA正解、あそこには山ほど魔道書があるからな。
ひとりで残ったときに、その……必要があったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008600_ALISAIE<tab>Or, to put it simply, you used it to sneak around the forbidden archives.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008600_ALISAIEあっ、わかった。
禁書庫に忍び込むのに使ったんでしょ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008610_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, yes, well...after a fashion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008610_GRAHATIA<tab>あー……いや、その……うん……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008620_GRAHATIA<tab>They're tall, you see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008620_GRAHATIA<tab>高いんだよ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008630_GRAHATIA<tab>The shelves─they're too tall for me! And I could hardly move the library's platforms without attracting attention now, could I!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008630_GRAHATIA高すぎるんだよッ、本棚が！
侵入中じゃ魔法の足場を動かすわけにもいかないし、
仕方ないだろ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ohhh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008640_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008650_ALISAIE<tab>Ohhh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008650_ALISAIE<tab>あー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008660_KRILE<tab>Ohhh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008660_KRILE<tab>あー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are we pushing on until dawn?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>今日は夜更かしになりそうだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Shall we call it a night?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>そろそろ片付けようか

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You do know these are “my” quarters...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>ところでここ、自分の部屋……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008670_ALPHINAUD<tab>I'm not that ambitious. But 'tis pleasant to idle away the hours every once in a while.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008670_ALPHINAUD明日に支障がない範囲で切り上げるよ。
たまには時間を忘れるのもいいけれどね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008680_ALISAIE<tab>One last cup of tea, then. Dickon said this brew helps relax the mind before bed...and gave us some leaves for free!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008680_ALISAIEああ、じゃあ最後にお茶を淹れるわ。
ディコンさんがおまけしてくれたのよ、
リラックスできるから寝る前に……ってね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008690_KRILE<tab>Why else did you think we were here? Surrender to thy fate, O champion!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008690_KRILEあら、だからみんなここに集まってるんじゃない？
観念なさいな、英雄さん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008700_AMON<tab>Ah, enjoying the bracing cold, I see. Do you not own a warm coat or a cloak? Something in fur or fashioned from the skins of your enemies, or...? Well, never mind that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008700_AMONここにいましたか。
生身でその格好だと冷えません？
まあどうでもいいんですけど。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008710_AMON<tab>I come to you once more as the bearer of bad news.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008710_AMON<tab>大変申し訳ないことに、またもや悪いご報告が。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008720_AMON<tab>Our tower in Thavnair has been toppled, and I need not tell you by whom.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008720_AMONサベネアにあった塔が、
かの英雄たちの活躍で消されちゃいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008730_AMON<tab>Given how many we have at our disposal, the loss of a single spire is hardly fatal to our plans. It does, however, slow the rate at which we siphon aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008730_AMONほかの塔は引き続きエーテルを吸っていますから、
それ自体は問題ありません。
ただ、どうしても効率は落ちる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008740_AMON<tab>If they continue to preoccupy themselves with the towers, then all will be well. But should our foe prove bold enough to strike at us here, then the timing becomes...questionable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008740_AMON連中が各地でぐずぐずしてくれていたらいいですが、
まっすぐここに攻め上ってきたら、
間に合うかどうか怪しいところですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008750_ZENOS<tab>Our foe is bold enough. Of that, I can assure you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008750_ZENOS……ならば、奴は来る。
必ずな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008760_AMON<tab>Yes, very well, then... I suppose I must prepare a proper welcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008760_AMON左様ですか……。
じゃあ精々、足止めの方法でも考えておくとしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008770_AMON<tab>Honestly, talk of your nemesis is the only thing you seem to enjoy. Does nothing else spark your interest?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008770_AMONというかあなた、本当に、
あの人のことを話すときだけ愉しそうですねぇ。
ほかのことに興味はないんです？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008780_ZENOS<tab>Hmm... No. All else is...equal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008780_ZENOSハ……。
そも、区別すらつかぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008790_ZENOS<tab>Equally tedious. Equally disappointing. The world is a tepid bog into which we sink, too weak to thrash as the mud clings to our eyes and fills our throats till we blissfully choke.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008790_ZENOSみな同じように退屈で、醜悪だ。
およそこの世は、ぬるい泥土が如きもの……
目を、息を塞がれ、誰もが知らぬ間にただ死んでいく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008800_ZENOS<tab>But then came the light. Blinding and pure and hot─so very hot. Enough to set my soul aflame.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008800_ZENOSだが俺は、光を見た。
極限の中で己を駆り立てる熱を知った。
……奴との戦いは、そういうものだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008810_ZENOS<tab>I basked in the afterglow...until the void yawned once more. And then I knew the muck would never claim me again. There was naught for me ahead, so I drew the curtain on all that had come before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008810_ZENOS戦いを終えたとき、もはや泥土の内には戻れなかった。
ゆえに先など在るものかと、幕を引いたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008820_ZENOS<tab>Burn, burn. Let the whole star burn. I will have my contest. I will reclaim my moment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008820_ZENOSあの言葉に偽りはない。
今も俺は、あの瞬間のためにだけ生きている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008830_AMON<tab>How wonderful that the emptiness of death has not dissuaded you from committing your life to its pursuit once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008830_AMON死を経験しながら、それほどの生き甲斐を持てるとは、
大変結構なことですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008840_AMON<tab>I don't know whether to envy you or pity you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008840_AMONええ、本当に……。
憎らしいやら、妬ましいやら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008850_ZENOS<tab>You question my disinterest, but what of yours? Despite your noisome antics, I sense you take little pleasure in this endeavor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008850_ZENOS俺に問う以前に、お前はどうだ。
煩く騒いではいるが、何ひとつ、愉しんではいなかろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008860_AMON<tab>Mercy, my lord... Such pointed barbs from one who barely acknowledges my existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008860_AMONうわ怖い……。
あれだけ無視しておきながら、そういうこと言っちゃいます？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008870_AMON<tab>Nevertheless, you are mistaken, for I do find this part somewhat enjoyable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008870_AMON<tab>でも残念、今は少しだけ愉しいんですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008880_AMON<tab>You see, when I was mortal, I would always have the same dream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008880_AMON<tab>……私ね、人だったころ、長いこと同じ夢を見ていたんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008890_AMON<tab>It was a fragmented thing. Disjointed. All the faces incomplete. The setting, too, was unknown to me, so I thought it simply a fantasy of my sleeping mind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008890_AMON途切れ途切れで、登場人物の顔なんかも欠けた、不完全な夢。
知らない場所のことでしたし、
単なる空想のひとつだと思ってました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008900_AMON<tab>Until one day, I realized it was showing me the truth─much as your dream of the Final Days enlightened you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008900_AMONただ、ある日、それが真実と繋がってしまったんですよ。
ちょうど、あなたが見ていた終末の夢のように。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008910_AMON<tab>And soon, very soon, the rest of the world will see the truth of my dream too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008910_AMON<tab>……あの夢が、間もなく世界にとっても真実になる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008920_AMON<tab>Yes, I think that is something we can both enjoy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008920_AMON<tab>それだけは、ええ、少し愉しいかなと。
